trans-unit.source: Represents an application domain, which is an isolated environment where applications execute.
trans-unit.target: 表示應用程式定義域，也就是應用程式執行的獨立環境。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Application domains, which are represented by <xref:System.AppDomain> objects, help provide isolation, unloading, and security boundaries for executing managed code.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式定義域，都由<xref:System.AppDomain>物件，協助您為執行 managed 程式碼提供隔離、 卸載和安全性界限。

trans-unit.source: Use application domains to isolate tasks that might bring down a process.
trans-unit.target: 使用應用程式定義域來隔離可能會讓處理序關閉的工作。

trans-unit.source: If the state of the <xref:System.AppDomain> that's executing a task becomes unstable, the <xref:System.AppDomain> can be unloaded without affecting the process.
trans-unit.target: 如果狀態<xref:System.AppDomain>，正在執行的工作變得不穩定，<xref:System.AppDomain>而不會影響處理序可以卸載。

trans-unit.source: This is important when a process must run for long periods without restarting.
trans-unit.target: 當處理程序必須執行很長，不需要重新啟動時，這很重要。

trans-unit.source: You can also use application domains to isolate tasks that should not share data.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用應用程式定義域來隔離不應共用資料的工作。

trans-unit.source: If an assembly is loaded into the default application domain, it cannot be unloaded from memory while the process is running.
trans-unit.target: 如果預設應用程式定義域載入組件，它不能從記憶體中卸載的情況，而處理序正在執行。

trans-unit.source: However, if you open a second application domain to load and execute the assembly, the assembly is unloaded when that application domain is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果您開啟第二個應用程式定義域載入並執行組件時，組件會卸載應用程式定義域卸載時。

trans-unit.source: Use this technique to minimize the working set of long-running processes that occasionally use large DLLs.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這項技術來減少偶爾使用大型 Dll 的長時間執行程序的工作集。

trans-unit.source: Multiple application domains can run in a single process; however, there is not a one-to-one correlation between application domains and threads.
trans-unit.target: 多個應用程式定義域可以單一處理序中執行;不過，沒有任何應用程式定義域和執行緒之間的一對一關聯性。

trans-unit.source: Several threads can belong to a single application domain, and while a given thread is not confined to a single application domain, at any given time, a thread executes in a single application domain.
trans-unit.target: 數個執行緒可以屬於單一應用程式定義域，並給定的執行緒並不會侷限於單一應用程式定義域，在任何時候，而執行緒執行單一應用程式網域中。

trans-unit.source: Application domains are created using the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立應用程式定義域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AppDomain> instances are used to load and execute assemblies (<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain> 執行個體用來載入並執行組件 (<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>)。

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.AppDomain> is no longer in use, it can be unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.AppDomain>已不再使用時，它可以卸載。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain> class implements a set of events that enable applications to respond when an assembly is loaded, when an application domain will be unloaded, or when an unhandled exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain>類別會實作一組可讓回應在載入組件，應用程式定義域都將被解除載入，或擲回未處理的例外狀況時的應用程式的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using application domains, see [Application Domains](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用應用程式定義域的詳細資訊，請參閱[應用程式定義域](~/docs/framework/app-domains/application-domains.md)。

trans-unit.source: This class implements the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, <xref:System._AppDomain>, and <xref:System.Security.IEvidenceFactory> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會實作<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>， <xref:System._AppDomain>，和<xref:System.Security.IEvidenceFactory>介面。

trans-unit.source: You should never create a remotable wrapper for an <xref:System.AppDomain> object.
trans-unit.target: 您絕對不要建立的遠端執行包裝函式<xref:System.AppDomain>物件。

trans-unit.source: Doing so could publish a remote reference to that <xref:System.AppDomain>, exposing methods such as <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> to remote access and effectively destroying code access security for that <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 這樣可發佈的遠端參考的<xref:System.AppDomain>，例如公開方法<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>遠端存取和有效終結該的 程式碼存取安全性<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: Malicious clients connecting to the remoted <xref:System.AppDomain> could obtain access to any resource the <xref:System.AppDomain> itself has access to.
trans-unit.target: 惡意用戶端連線到遠端<xref:System.AppDomain>無法取得任何資源的存取權<xref:System.AppDomain>本身具有存取權。

trans-unit.source: Do not create remotable wrappers for any type that extends <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> and that implements methods that could be used by malicious clients to bypass the security system.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立遠端使用包裝函式，以擴充任何型別<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>以及實作可能由惡意用戶端用來略過安全性系統的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DisallowCodeDownload%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: This setting is unsafe for services.
trans-unit.target: 這項設定是不安全的服務。

trans-unit.source: To prevent services from downloading partially trusted code, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止服務下載部分信任程式碼，將此屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to create a new <xref:System.AppDomain>, instantiate a type in that new <xref:System.AppDomain>, and communicate with that type’s object.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何建立新<xref:System.AppDomain>，具現化類型中的新<xref:System.AppDomain>，以及該類型的物件之間的通訊。

trans-unit.source: In addition, this example shows how to unload the <xref:System.AppDomain> causing the object to be garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 此外，此範例示範如何卸載<xref:System.AppDomain>造成要進行記憶體回收的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the activation context for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前應用程式定義域的啟動內容。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the activation context for the current application domain, or <see langword="null" /> if the domain has no activation context.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示目前應用程式定義域的啟動內容，如果此定義域沒有任何啟動內容，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory to be appended to the private path.
trans-unit.target: 要附加到私用路徑的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified directory name to the private path list.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的目錄名稱附加至私用 (Private) 路徑清單。

trans-unit.source: The use of this property is not recommended, because it might change the probing path for assemblies after they have already been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 不建議使用此屬性，因為它可能會探查路徑的組件之後變更它們已經載入。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 請改用 <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The private path, or relative search path, is the path relative to the base directory where the assembly resolver probes for private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 私用的路徑或相對搜尋路徑是相對於組件解析程式其中探查私用組件的基底目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity of the application in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式定義域中的應用程式之識別。

trans-unit.source: An object that identifies the application in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可識別應用程式定義域中的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: Gets information describing permissions granted to an application and whether the application has a trust level that allows it to run.
trans-unit.target: 取得資訊，以描述授與應用程式的權限，以及該應用程式是否有允許其執行的信任層級。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates permission and trust information for the application in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可針對應用程式定義域中的應用程式來封裝使用權限和信任資訊。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The assembly display name, in the form provided by the <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 組件的顯示名稱，其格式為 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" /> 屬性所提供。

trans-unit.source: Returns the assembly display name after policy has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 在套用原則之後傳回組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the assembly display name after policy has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 一個字串，其中包含套用原則之後的組件顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.ApplyPolicy%2A> method takes an assembly display name and returns the post-policy display name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.ApplyPolicy%2A>方法會採用單一組件顯示名稱和傳回原則後顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if you need to load an assembly using policy, because the reflection-only context does not apply policy.
trans-unit.target: 這是您需要載入組件使用 「 原則 」，因為僅限反映的內容不會套用原則時相當實用。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an assembly is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 發生於載入組件時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler> delegate for this event indicates what assembly was loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AssemblyLoadEventHandler>委派這個事件指出哪些組件已載入。

trans-unit.source: To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyLoad>事件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails.
trans-unit.target: 發生於組件解析失敗時。

trans-unit.source: It is the responsibility of the <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler> for this event to return the assembly that is specified by the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized.
trans-unit.target: 它負責<xref:System.ResolveEventHandler>傳回組件由所指定的這個事件<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，或傳回 null，如果組件無法辨識。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must be loaded into an execution context; if it is loaded into the reflection-only context, the load that caused this event to be raised fails.
trans-unit.target: 組件必須載入執行內容。如果載入僅限反映的內容時，會引發這個事件的負載將會失敗。

trans-unit.source: For guidance on the use of this event, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需使用這個事件的指引，請參閱[解析組件載入](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md)。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回要求無法解析組件載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: For example, the loader might be unable to load a dependency of the requesting assembly because the requesting assembly and its dependency are not in the probing path.
trans-unit.target: 例如，載入器可能無法載入要求的組件的相依性，因為要求的組件和其相依性不探查路徑中。

trans-unit.source: Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in locating the dependency or in identifying the correct version, if more than one version of the dependency is available.
trans-unit.target: 了解要求的組件的識別可能有助於在尋找相依性或識別最正確的版本，如果使用多個版本的相依性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler> event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<xref:System.ResolveEventHandler>引發的所有組件，包括資源組件。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版中，資源組件不引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain.
trans-unit.target: 如果當地語系化的作業系統，此處理常式可能會多次呼叫： 每個文化特性在後援鍊結中的一次。

trans-unit.source: For this event, the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns the assembly name before policy is applied.
trans-unit.target: 對於此事件，<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性在套用原則之前，會傳回組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: If more than one event handler is registered for this event, the event handlersarecalled in order until an event handler returns a value that isn't `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個事件處理常式註冊這個事件，事件 handlersarecalled 順序的事件處理常式傳回的值之前，不是`null`。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent event handlers are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 會忽略後續的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.target: 取得組件解析程式 (Resolver) 用來探查組件的基底目錄。

trans-unit.source: The base directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 組件解析程式用來探查組件的基底目錄。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會對應至<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It can also be retrieved using the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method with the string "APPBASE".
trans-unit.target: 它也可使用擷取<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>與字串"APPBASE"的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new application domain, specifying a base directory to use when searching for assemblies to load into the domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的應用程式定義域，指定要用於搜尋組件時，載入定義域的基底目錄。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory%2A> property to obtain the base directory path, for display to the console.
trans-unit.target: 然後此範例使用<xref:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory%2A>屬性，以取得基底目錄路徑，以顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: for access to the information in the path itself, including if the path is in the form "file://" or \\\UNC\dir or "c:\\".
trans-unit.target: 存取路徑本身中的資訊，如果包含路徑的格式為"file:// 或\\\UNC\dir 或"c:\\"。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />。

trans-unit.source: Resets the path that specifies the location of private assemblies to the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 將指定私用組件位置的路徑重設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The private path is a path relative to the base directory that the common language runtime searches to locate private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 私用路徑是相對於 common language runtime 會搜尋來尋找私用組件的基底目錄路徑。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.AppDomain.ClearPrivatePath%2A> method to remove all entries from the list of private paths to search when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.ClearPrivatePath%2A>方法從已載入組件時所要搜尋的私用路徑的清單移除所有項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, and should not be used for new development.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經過時，並不應該用於新的開發工作。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Resets the list of directories containing shadow copied assemblies to the empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 將含有陰影複製的組件目錄清單重設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The shadow copy path is a list of directories where shadow copied assemblies are stored.
trans-unit.target: 陰影複製路徑是儲存的陰影複製組件的所在目錄的清單。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).

trans-unit.source: The newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: This method overload uses the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> information from the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法多載會使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>來自預設應用程式定義域的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，使用目前的應用程式定義域的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用這個方法多載來建立沙箱化應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29> method overload to create sandboxed application domains.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new application domain using the specified name, evidence, application domain setup information, default permission set, and array of fully trusted assemblies.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, an exception is thrown.

trans-unit.target: 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，使用目前的應用程式定義域的辨識項。

The <see cref="P:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase" /> property is not set on the <see cref="T:System.AppDomainSetup" /> object that is supplied for <paramref name="info" />.

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlAppDomain" />。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the domain.
trans-unit.target: 定義域的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: This friendly name can be displayed in user interfaces to identify the domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個易記名稱可以在使用者介面中顯示以識別該定義域。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="P:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName" />。

trans-unit.source: Evidence that establishes the identity of the code that runs in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 辨識項，可建立能在應用程式定義域內執行之程式碼的識別。

trans-unit.source: Pass <see langword="null" /> to use the evidence of the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 <see langword="null" /> 可使用目前應用程式定義域的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The base directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 組件解析程式用來探查組件的基底目錄。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="P:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory" />。

trans-unit.source: The path relative to the base directory where the assembly resolver should probe for private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 相對於組件解析程式應該探查私用組件之基底目錄的路徑。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.RelativeSearchPath" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<see cref="P:System.AppDomain.RelativeSearchPath" />。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, a shadow copy of an assembly is loaded into this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果為 <see langword="true" />，則會將組件的陰影複本載入這個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new application domain with the given name, using evidence, application base path, relative search path, and a parameter that specifies whether a shadow copy of an assembly is to be loaded into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項、應用程式基底路徑、相對搜尋路徑和指定是否要將組件的陰影複本載入應用程式定義域的參數，建立具有指定名稱的新應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: If `securityInfo` is not supplied, the evidence from the current application domain is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`securityInfo`是未提供，使用目前的應用程式定義域的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about shadow copying, see <xref:System.AppDomain.ShadowCopyFiles%2A> and [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.ShadowCopyFiles%2A>和[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Do not use this method overload to create sandboxed application domains.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用這個方法多載來建立沙箱化應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the evidence that is supplied for `securityInfo` no longer affects the grant set of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，提供的辨識項`securityInfo`不會再影響應用程式定義域的授權集。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29> method overload to create sandboxed application domains.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29>方法多載來建立沙箱化應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範，在一般情況下，如何建立使用其中一種網域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A>多載。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to load a shadow copy of an assembly into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示將組件的陰影複本載入到應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> delegate that represents a callback method to invoke when the new <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> object is initialized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AppDomainInitializer" /> 委派，表示當初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 物件時所叫用的回呼方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of string arguments to be passed to the callback represented by <c>adInit</c>, when the new <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> object is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 當初始化新的 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 物件時，要傳遞給由 <c>adInit</c> 代表的回呼之字串引數陣列。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new application domain with the given name, using evidence, application base path, relative search path, and a parameter that specifies whether a shadow copy of an assembly is to be loaded into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項、應用程式基底路徑、相對搜尋路徑和指定是否要將組件的陰影複本載入應用程式定義域的參數，建立具有指定名稱的新應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a callback method that is invoked when the application domain is initialized, and an array of string arguments to pass the callback method.
trans-unit.target: 指定當初始化應用程式定義域時所叫用的回呼方法，以及要傳遞給該回呼方法的字串引數陣列。

trans-unit.source: The newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: 新建立的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The method represented by `adInit` is executed in the context of the newly created application domain.
trans-unit.target: 所表示的方法`adInit`新建立的應用程式定義域的內容中執行。

trans-unit.source: to provide evidence.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a specified type defined in a specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 建立在指定組件中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance specified by <paramref name="typeName" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，是 <paramref name="typeName" /> 所指定的新執行個體之包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The return value needs to be unwrapped to access the real object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值需要解除包裝以存取實際物件。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫預設建構函式`typeName`。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> for the format of `assemblyName`.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>格式的`assemblyName`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>目標的應用程式定義域中不是目前的應用程式定義域會在目標應用程式定義域中的組件載入成功。

trans-unit.source: Since an <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> is not <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, when this method attempts to return the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>不<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，當這個方法會嘗試傳回<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>目前的應用程式定義域載入組件，common language runtime 會嘗試對目前的應用程式定義域載入組件，負載可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式定義域中載入的組件可能從不同的兩個應用程式定義域的路徑設定是否先載入的組件不同。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> or <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 或 <paramref name="typeName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyName" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have permission to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有呼叫這個建構函式的權限。

trans-unit.source: No matching public constructor was found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到相符的公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typename" /> was not found in <paramref name="assemblyName" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 中找不到 <paramref name="typename" />。

trans-unit.source: This instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for access to read from a file or directory, and for access to the information in the path itself.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取從檔案或目錄，以及在本身的路徑資訊的存取權的存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code when creating an instance of a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立委派的執行個體時，呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與 client-activated 物件有關。用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain.

trans-unit.source: for the ability to call unmanaged code when creating an instance of a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立委派的執行個體時，呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to invoke operations on all type members.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有類型成員上叫用作業的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether to perform a case-sensitive search or not.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A combination of zero or more bit flags that affect the search for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個位元旗標的組合，此位元旗標會影響 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <c>bindingAttr</c> is zero, a case-sensitive search for public constructors is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>bindingAttr</c> 為零，則會針對公用建構函式執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is null, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 為 null，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: This array of arguments must match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 這個引數陣列必須在數目、順序和類型上符合要叫用之建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: If the default constructor is preferred, <c>args</c> must be an empty array or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果慣用預設的建構函式，則 <c>args</c> 必須是空陣列或 Null。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific information that governs the coercion of <c>args</c> to the formal types declared for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的資訊，其可控制 <c>args</c> 到型式類型 (為 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式宣告) 的強制轉型。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與啟動了用戶端的物件相關。

trans-unit.source: Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify a binder, binding flags, constructor arguments, culture-specific information used to interpret arguments, and optional activation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定繫結器、繫結旗標、建構函式引數、用來解譯引數的特定文化特性資訊，以及選擇性的啟動屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance specified by <paramref name="typeName" />.
trans-unit.target: 物件，是 <paramref name="typeName" /> 所指定的新執行個體之包裝函式。

trans-unit.source: The return value needs to be unwrapped to access the real object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值需要解除包裝以存取實際物件。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> for the format of `assemblyName`.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>格式的`assemblyName`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to call <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> on a target application domain that is not the current application domain will result in a successful load of the assembly in the target application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>目標的應用程式定義域中不是目前的應用程式定義域會在目標應用程式定義域中的組件載入成功。

trans-unit.source: Since an <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> is not <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, when this method attempts to return the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> for the loaded assembly to the current application domain, the common language runtime will try to load the assembly into the current application domain and the load might fail.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>不<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，當這個方法會嘗試傳回<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>目前的應用程式定義域載入組件，common language runtime 會嘗試對目前的應用程式定義域載入組件，負載可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that is loaded into the current application domain might be different from the assembly that was loaded first if the path settings for the two application domains are different.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式定義域中載入的組件可能從不同的兩個應用程式定義域的路徑設定是否先載入的組件不同。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> or <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version of the common language runtime than the version that is currently loaded.

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was not found.

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method that combines <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>, and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果您進行早期繫結呼叫的方法`M`型別的物件的`T1`所傳回<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>，而該方法的型別物件的方法的早期繫結呼叫`T2`組件中`C`以外目前組件或組件包含`T1`，組件`C`會載入目前應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>, or in other dynamically generated code.
trans-unit.target: 即使早期繫結呼叫，就會發生此載入`T1.M()`中的主體進行<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>，或其他動態產生的程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的定義域是預設網域，組件`C`程序結束之前無法卸載。

trans-unit.source: If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的定義域之後嘗試載入組件`C`，負載可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the simplest way to execute code in another application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範最簡單的方式，另一個應用程式定義域中執行程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The example defines a class named `Worker` that inherits from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會定義名為類別`Worker`繼承自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>。

trans-unit.source: The `Worker` class defines a method that displays the name of the application domain in which it is executing.
trans-unit.target: `Worker`類別定義的方法，顯示它正在執行的應用程式定義域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The example creates instances of `Worker` in the default application domain and in a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立的執行個體`Worker`在預設應用程式定義域和新的應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains `Worker` must be loaded into both application domains, but it can load other assemblies that exist only in the new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 包含的組件`Worker`必須載入到兩個應用程式定義域，但只存在於新的應用程式定義域的其他組件可以載入。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> or <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 或 <paramref name="typeName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest, or if you are creating a type from a module other than the manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 能夠讀取該檔案包含組件資訊清單中，或如果您要建立從模組資訊清單檔以外的類型。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與 client-activated 物件有關。用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the assembly where the type is defined, the name of the type, and an array of activation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定定義類型所在的組件、類型的名稱和啟動屬性的陣列。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether to perform a case-sensitive search or not.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A combination of zero or more bit flags that affect the search for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個位元旗標的組合，此位元旗標會影響 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <c>bindingAttr</c> is zero, a case-sensitive search for public constructors is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>bindingAttr</c> 為零，則會針對公用建構函式執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is null, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 為 null，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: This array of arguments must match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 這個引數陣列必須在數目、順序和類型上符合要叫用之建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: If the default constructor is preferred, <c>args</c> must be an empty array or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果慣用預設的建構函式，則 <c>args</c> 必須是空陣列或 Null。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific object used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用來控制類型強制的特定文化特性物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，就是包含單一 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 會指定啟動遠端物件所需的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.

trans-unit.source: Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly, specifying whether the case of the type name is ignored; the binding attributes and the binder that are used to select the type to be created; the arguments of the constructor; the culture; and the activation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定是否忽略類型名稱的大小寫、用於選取要建立之類型的繫結屬性和繫結器、建構函式的引數、文化特性，以及啟動屬性，為指定之組件中定義的指定類型，建立新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether to perform a case-sensitive search or not.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A combination of zero or more bit flags that affect the search for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個位元旗標的組合，此位元旗標會影響 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <c>bindingAttr</c> is zero, a case-sensitive search for public constructors is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>bindingAttr</c> 為零，則會針對公用建構函式執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is null, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 為 null，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: This array of arguments must match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 這個引數陣列必須在數目、順序和類型上符合要叫用之建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: If the default constructor is preferred, <c>args</c> must be an empty array or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果慣用預設的建構函式，則 <c>args</c> 必須是空陣列或 Null。

trans-unit.source: A culture-specific object used to govern the coercion of types.
trans-unit.target: 用來控制類型強制的特定文化特性物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see langword="CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與啟動了用戶端的物件相關。

trans-unit.source: Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Information used to authorize creation of <c>typeName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用來授權建立 <c>typeName</c> 的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify the name of the type, and how it is found and created.
trans-unit.target: 參數會指定類型的名稱，以及如何尋找和建立它。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the object specified by <paramref name="typeName" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 指定之物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method that combines <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這是便利的方法，它結合了<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> for the format of `assemblyName`.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>格式的`assemblyName`。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the format of `typeName`.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Type.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性的格式`typeName`。

trans-unit.source: If you make an early-bound call to a method `M` of an object of type `T1` that was returned by <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>, and that method makes an early-bound call to a method of an object of type `T2` in an assembly `C` other than the current assembly or the assembly containing `T1`, assembly `C` is loaded into the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果您進行早期繫結呼叫的方法`M`型別的物件的`T1`所傳回<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>，而該方法的型別物件的方法的早期繫結呼叫`T2`組件中`C`以外目前組件或組件包含`T1`，組件`C`會載入目前應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: This loading occurs even if the early-bound call to `T1.M()` was made in the body of a <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>, or in other dynamically generated code.
trans-unit.target: 即使早期繫結呼叫，就會發生此載入`T1.M()`中的主體進行<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod>，或其他動態產生的程式碼中。

trans-unit.source: If the current domain is the default domain, assembly `C` cannot be unloaded until the process ends.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的定義域是預設網域，組件`C`程序結束之前無法卸載。

trans-unit.source: If the current domain later attempts to load assembly `C`, the load might fail.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的定義域之後嘗試載入組件`C`，負載可能會失敗。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the use of the `ignoreCase` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用`ignoreCase`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> or <paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 或 <paramref name="typeName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: No matching constructor was found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到相符的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typename" /> was not found in <paramref name="assemblyName" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 中找不到 <paramref name="typename" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyName" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have permission to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有呼叫這個建構函式的權限。

trans-unit.source: The caller cannot provide activation attributes for an object that does not inherit from <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者無法提供非繼承自 <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> 之物件的啟動屬性。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供讀取包含組件資訊清單之檔案的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: to load an assembly with evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項載入組件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to invoke operations on all type members.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有類型成員上叫用作業的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a specified type defined in the specified assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件檔案中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name, including the path, of a file that contains an assembly that defines the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的名稱 (包括路徑)，此檔案包含會定義要求之類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly is loaded using the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 此組件使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom(System.String)" /> 方法載入。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件檔案中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="typeName" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 對新執行個體而言是包裝函式的物件，但如果沒有找到 <paramref name="typeName" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value needs to be unwrapped to access the real object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值需要解除包裝以存取實際物件。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor for `typeName` is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式`typeName`叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A> method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A>方法用來建立目標應用程式定義域以外進行呼叫的應用程式定義域中的執行個體、 組件會在目標應用程式定義域中載入。

trans-unit.source: However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果呼叫的應用程式定義域中執行個體解除包裝，使用包裝的執行個體所規定的方式可能會導致要呼叫的應用程式定義域載入組件。

trans-unit.source: For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound.
trans-unit.target: 例如，執行個體已解除包裝之後，可能會要求其類型資訊，才能呼叫其方法晚期繫結。

trans-unit.source: When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur.
trans-unit.target: 組件載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域時，可能會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as <xref:System.MissingMethodException> can occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一個版本的相同組件先前已載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域，或例如是不同的目標應用程式定義域的例外狀況呼叫的應用程式定義域的載入路徑<xref:System.MissingMethodException>可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, <xref:System.InvalidCastException> can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的應用程式定義域呼叫早期繫結執行個體的型別，<xref:System.InvalidCastException>試圖轉換執行個體可能會擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method overload to create an instance of an object in a target application domain and call its methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>方法多載來建立目標應用程式定義域中物件的執行個體並呼叫其方法。

trans-unit.source: The example defines the `MarshallableExample` class, which can be marshaled across application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會定義`MarshallableExample`類別，可以跨應用程式定義域界限封送處理。

trans-unit.source: The example builds a path to the currently executing assembly, creates a target application domain, and uses the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29> method overload to load the example assembly into the target application domain and create an instance of `MarshallableExample`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立目前執行的組件的路徑、 建立目標應用程式定義域，並使用<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%28System.String%2CSystem.String%29>範例組件載入到目標應用程式定義域，並建立的執行個體的方法多載`MarshallableExample`。

trans-unit.source: The path is absolute in this example, but a relative path would also work because the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is used to load the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 路徑為絕對的在此範例中，但是相對路徑也可以運作，因為<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法用來載入組件。

trans-unit.source: After unwrapping the object handle, the example demonstrates three ways to use an object in a target application domain:
trans-unit.target: 之後進行解除包裝的物件控制代碼，此範例會示範三種方式可使用目標應用程式定義域中的物件：

trans-unit.source: Invoking a method with late binding, using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用晚期繫結，使用反映，叫用方法。

trans-unit.source: This requires type information, which causes the assembly to be loaded into the application domain of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 這需要類型資訊，則組件載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: (In this example, it is already loaded.)
trans-unit.target: （在此範例中，它已經載入。）

trans-unit.source: Casting the object to an interface known to both the caller and the callee.
trans-unit.target: 轉型至呼叫端和被呼叫端知道介面的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the interface is defined in the calling assembly or in a third assembly referenced by both the caller and the callee, the called assembly is not loaded into the application domain of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的組件中或第三個呼叫端和被呼叫端所參考的組件定義介面，呼叫的組件未載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Using the object directly when its type is known to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 直接呼叫端知道其型別時，請使用物件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must be loaded into the application domain of the caller.
trans-unit.target: 組件必須載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Another way to avoid loading the called assembly into the application domain of the caller is for the caller to derive from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class and to define a method that can be run in the target application domain.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免被呼叫的組件載入至呼叫端的應用程式定義域的另一個方法是呼叫者是衍生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>類別，以及定義目標應用程式定義域中執行的方法。

trans-unit.source: That method can use reflection to examine a target assembly, because the target assembly is already loaded into the target application domain.
trans-unit.target: 該方法可以使用反映來查看目標組件，因為目標組件已載入至目標應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: See the example for the <xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱範例的<xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 如需有關這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A> method is used to create an instance in a target application domain, other than the application domain from which the call is made, the assembly is loaded in the target application domain.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A>方法用來建立目標應用程式定義域以外進行呼叫的應用程式定義域中的執行個體、 組件會在目標應用程式定義域中載入。

trans-unit.source: However, if the instance is unwrapped in the calling application domain, using the unwrapped instance in certain ways can cause the assembly to be loaded into the calling application domain.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果呼叫的應用程式定義域中執行個體解除包裝，使用包裝的執行個體所規定的方式可能會導致要呼叫的應用程式定義域載入組件。

trans-unit.source: For example, after the instance is unwrapped, its type information might be requested, in order to call its methods late-bound.
trans-unit.target: 例如，執行個體已解除包裝之後，可能會要求其類型資訊，才能呼叫其方法晚期繫結。

trans-unit.source: When the assembly is loaded into the calling application domain, exceptions can occur.
trans-unit.target: 組件載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域時，可能會發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If another version of the same assembly was previously loaded into the calling application domain, or if the load path of the calling application domain is different from that of the target application domain, exceptions such as <xref:System.MissingMethodException> can occur.
trans-unit.target: 如果另一個版本的相同組件先前已載入至呼叫的應用程式定義域，或例如是不同的目標應用程式定義域的例外狀況呼叫的應用程式定義域的載入路徑<xref:System.MissingMethodException>可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: If the calling application domain makes early-bound calls to the instance type, <xref:System.InvalidCastException> can be thrown when an attempt is made to cast the instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫的應用程式定義域呼叫早期繫結執行個體的型別，<xref:System.InvalidCastException>試圖轉換執行個體可能會擲回。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyFile" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> was not found in <paramref name="assemblyFile" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 中找不到 <paramref name="typeName" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have sufficient permission to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有足以呼叫這個建構函式的權限。

trans-unit.source: No matching public constructor was found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到相符的公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The caller cannot provide activation attributes for an object that does not inherit from <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者無法提供非繼承自 <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> 之物件的啟動屬性。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: This instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供讀取包含組件資訊清單之檔案的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: The name, including the path, of a file that contains an assembly that defines the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的名稱 (包括路徑)，此檔案包含會定義要求之類型的組件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly is loaded using the <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom(System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 此組件使用 <see cref="M:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFrom(System.String)" /> 方法載入。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether to perform a case-sensitive search or not.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A combination of zero or more bit flags that affect the search for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個位元旗標的組合，此位元旗標會影響 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <c>bindingAttr</c> is zero, a case-sensitive search for public constructors is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>bindingAttr</c> 為零，則會針對公用建構函式執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is null, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 為 null，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: This array of arguments must match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 這個引數陣列必須在數目、順序和類型上符合要叫用之建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: If the default constructor is preferred, <c>args</c> must be an empty array or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果慣用預設的建構函式，則 <c>args</c> 必須是空陣列或 Null。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific information that governs the coercion of <c>args</c> to the formal types declared for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的資訊，其可控制 <c>args</c> 到型式類型 (為 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式宣告) 的強制轉型。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與啟動了用戶端的物件相關。

trans-unit.source: Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件檔案中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An object that is a wrapper for the new instance, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="typeName" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 對新執行個體而言是包裝函式的物件，但如果沒有找到 <paramref name="typeName" />，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value needs to be unwrapped to access the real object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值需要解除包裝以存取實際物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyFile" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> was not found in <paramref name="assemblyFile" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 中找不到 <paramref name="typeName" />。

trans-unit.source: No matching public constructor was found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到相符的公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have sufficient permission to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有足以呼叫這個建構函式的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: This instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供讀取包含組件資訊清單之檔案的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: to provide evidence.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of a specified type defined in the specified assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件檔案中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The file name and path of the assembly that defines the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 定義所要求類型之組件的檔案名稱與路徑。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件檔案中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The requested object, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="typeName" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 要求的物件；當找不到 <paramref name="typeName" /> 時，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method that combines <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這是便利的方法，它結合了<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the default constructor for `typeName`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫預設建構函式`typeName`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供讀取包含組件資訊清單之檔案的能力。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: The file name and path of the assembly that defines the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 定義所要求類型之組件的檔案名稱與路徑。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly (see the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property).
trans-unit.target: 所要求類型的完整名稱，包括命名空間，但不包括組件 (請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性)。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與 client-activated 物件有關。用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫者無法提供非繼承自 <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> 之物件的啟動屬性。
