Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供讀取包含組件資訊清單之檔案的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: The file name and path of the assembly that defines the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 定義所要求類型之組件的檔案名稱與路徑。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the requested type, including the namespace but not the assembly, as returned by the <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Type.FullName" /> 屬性傳回的要求類型之完整名稱 (包括命名空間，但不包括組件)。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value specifying whether to perform a case-sensitive search or not.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: A combination of zero or more bit flags that affect the search for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 零或多個位元旗標的組合，此位元旗標會影響 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: If <c>bindingAttr</c> is zero, a case-sensitive search for public constructors is conducted.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>bindingAttr</c> 為零，則會針對公用建構函式執行區分大小寫的搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An object that enables the binding, coercion of argument types, invocation of members, and retrieval of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> objects through reflection.
trans-unit.target: 使用反映來啟用繫結、強制引數的類型、成員的引動過程，和擷取 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MemberInfo" /> 物件的物件。

trans-unit.source: If <c>binder</c> is null, the default binder is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>binder</c> 為 null，則會使用預設繫結器。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to pass to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 要傳遞到建構函式的引數。

trans-unit.source: This array of arguments must match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
trans-unit.target: 這個引數陣列必須在數目、順序和類型上符合要叫用之建構函式的參數。

trans-unit.source: If the default constructor is preferred, <c>args</c> must be an empty array or null.
trans-unit.target: 如果慣用預設的建構函式，則 <c>args</c> 必須是空陣列或 Null。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specific information that governs the coercion of <c>args</c> to the formal types declared for the <c>typeName</c> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 特定文化特性的資訊，其可控制 <c>args</c> 到型式類型 (為 <c>typeName</c> 建構函式宣告) 的強制轉型。

trans-unit.source: If <c>culture</c> is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> for the current thread is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果「文化特性 (Culture)」<c></c>是 <see langword="null" />，則使用目前執行緒的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of one or more attributes that can participate in activation.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個屬性的陣列，此屬性可參與啟動過程。

trans-unit.source: Typically, an array that contains a single <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> object that specifies the URL that is required to activate a remote object.
trans-unit.target: 陣列通常只會包含一個 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute" /> 物件來指定用以啟動遠端物件的 URL。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is related to client-activated objects.
trans-unit.target: 此參數與啟動了用戶端的物件相關。

trans-unit.source: Client activation is a legacy technology that is retained for backward compatibility but is not recommended for new development.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端啟動是一項舊的技術，保留目的在提供回溯相容性，不建議用於新的開發。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly file, specifying whether the case of the type name is ignored; the binding attributes and the binder that are used to select the type to be created; the arguments of the constructor; the culture; and the activation attributes.
trans-unit.target: 藉由指定是否忽略類型名稱的大小寫、用於選取要建立之類型的繫結屬性和繫結器、建構函式的引數、文化特性，以及啟動屬性，為指定之組件檔中定義的指定類型，建立新的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The requested object, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="typeName" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 要求的物件；當找不到 <paramref name="typeName" /> 時，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method that combines <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這是便利的方法，它結合了<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Distributed applications should instead use Windows Communication Foundation.
trans-unit.target: 分散式應用程式應該改用 Windows Communication Foundation。

trans-unit.source: Information used to authorize creation of <c>typeName</c>.
trans-unit.target: 用來授權建立 <c>typeName</c> 的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified type defined in the specified assembly file.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定組件檔案中所定義之指定類型的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The requested object, or <see langword="null" /> if <paramref name="typeName" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 要求的物件；當找不到 <paramref name="typeName" /> 時，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience method that combines <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這是便利的方法，它結合了<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceFrom%2A>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjectHandle.Unwrap%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this method, see the <xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Activator.CreateInstanceFrom%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="typeName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="typeName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller cannot provide activation attributes for an object that does not inherit from <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者無法提供非繼承自 <see cref="T:System.MarshalByRefObject" /> 之物件的啟動屬性。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyName" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="typeName" /> was not found in <paramref name="assemblyName" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 中找不到 <paramref name="typeName" />。

trans-unit.source: No matching public constructor was found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到相符的公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have sufficient permission to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有足以呼叫這個建構函式的權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，編譯 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to read the file containing the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 提供讀取包含組件資訊清單之檔案的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取組件的位置，如果組件不是本機的能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current application domain for the current <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see cref="T:System.Threading.Thread" /> 的目前應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 目前的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立新的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A> property is used to obtain an <xref:System.AppDomain> object that represents the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A>屬性用來取得<xref:System.AppDomain>物件，代表目前的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A> property provides the name of the current application domain, which is then displayed at the command line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A>屬性提供的名稱，即會顯示在命令列的目前應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The access mode for the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供給動態組件的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly with the specified name and access mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱和存取模式定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and access mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和存取模式的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該只可用來在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並且包含的動態組件的辨識項<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`.

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method and <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法和<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> begins with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以空白字元開頭，或者包含正斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The access mode for the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供給動態組件的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable list of attributes to be applied to the assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if there are no attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到組件的可列舉屬性清單，如果沒有任何屬性，則是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly with the specified name, access mode, and custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式及自訂屬性來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法多載來指定無法正常運作除非建立動態組件時，它們會套用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes such as <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute> and <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created.
trans-unit.target: 例如，安全性等屬性時<xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute>和<xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute>無法正常運作如果建立動態組件之後加入。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應用於只在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this restriction, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這項限制的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中引進這個方法多載[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample shows how to create a dynamic assembly that has the <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立動態組件具有<xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The attribute must be specified as an element of an array of <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder> objects.
trans-unit.target: 屬性必須指定陣列的項目為<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>物件。

trans-unit.source: The first step in creating the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder> is to obtain a constructor for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 建立第一個步驟<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>，取得屬性的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The constructor has no parameters, so the <xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A> method is called with an empty array of <xref:System.Type> objects to represent the types of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式具有任何參數，所以<xref:System.Type.GetConstructor%2A>方法呼叫的空陣列<xref:System.Type>物件，以表示參數的類型。

trans-unit.source: The second step is to pass the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo> object to the constructor for the <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder> class, together with an empty array of type <xref:System.Object> to represent the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 第二個步驟是將產生<xref:System.Reflection.ConstructorInfo>物件的建構函式<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>類別，以及類型的空陣列<xref:System.Object>來表示引數。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder> is then passed to the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method as the only element of an array.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.CustomAttributeBuilder>會接著傳遞給<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法以做為陣列的唯一項目。

trans-unit.source: The example code defines a module and a type in the new dynamic assembly, and then displays the assembly's attributes.
trans-unit.target: 範例程式碼模組和類型會定義新的動態組件，並顯示組件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> starts with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以泛空白字元開頭，或者含有斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 將用來存取動態組件的模式。

trans-unit.source: The evidence supplied for the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供給動態組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The evidence is used unaltered as the final set of evidence used for policy resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此辨識項的使用不變，與用於原則解析的最終辨識項集合相同。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, and evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式和辨識項來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供其`evidence`定義動態時<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>。

trans-unit.source: The runtime will map the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> through the security policy to determine the granted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段會將對應<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>透過安全性原則，以判斷授與權限。

trans-unit.source: Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`.
trans-unit.target: 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供 null `evidence`。

trans-unit.source: If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> to the dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> being defined and marks policy as resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果`evidence`是`null`，執行階段將複製的權限集合，也就是目前授與及拒絕呼叫者的集合，<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>來動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>所定義，並標示為已解決的原則。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> was saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>會儲存到磁碟，後續的載入時，會與位置關聯的原則為基礎的授與其中<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>已儲存。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該只可用來在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並且包含的動態組件的辨識項<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`.

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method and the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法和<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: First, the code example tries to create an instance of `MyDynamicType` by calling the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> method with an invalid assembly name, and catches the resulting exception.
trans-unit.target: 首先，程式碼範例會嘗試建立的執行個體`MyDynamicType`藉由呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>方法具有無效的組件名稱，並攔截產生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The code example then adds an event handler for the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event, and again tries to create an instance of`MyDynamicType`.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例將事件處理常式<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件，並再次嘗試建立的執行個體`MyDynamicType`。

trans-unit.source: During the call to <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>, the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event is raised for the invalid assembly.
trans-unit.target: 若要在呼叫期間<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>、<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>無效的組件都會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler creates a dynamic assembly that contains a type named `MyDynamicType`, gives the type a parameterless constructor, and returns the new dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式會建立動態組件包含名為類型`MyDynamicType`，會提供類型的無參數建構函式，並傳回新的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: The call to <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A> then finishes successfully, and the constructor for `MyDynamicType` displays a message at the console.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstance%2A>成功，然後完成的建構函式和`MyDynamicType`主控台會顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> begins with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以空白字元開頭，或者包含正斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: to load an assembly with evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項載入組件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 將用來存取動態組件的模式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory where the assembly will be saved.
trans-unit.target: 將儲存組件的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <c>dir</c> is <see langword="null" />, the directory defaults to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>dir</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，目錄會預設為目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, and storage directory.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式和儲存目錄來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該只可用來在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並且包含的動態組件的辨識項<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`.

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method and <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法和<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> begins with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以空白字元開頭，或者包含正斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The access mode for the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供給動態組件的存取模式。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable list of attributes to be applied to the assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if there are no attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到組件的可列舉屬性清單，如果沒有任何屬性，則是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The source of the security context.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容的來源。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly with the specified name, access mode, and custom attributes, and using the specified source for its security context.
trans-unit.target: 定義動態組件，這個動態組件具有指定的名稱、存取模式和自訂模式，並且使用指定的來源做為安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法多載來指定無法正常運作除非建立動態組件時，它們會套用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes such as <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute> and <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created.
trans-unit.target: 例如，安全性等屬性時<xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute>和<xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute>無法正常運作如果建立動態組件之後加入。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應用於只在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this restriction, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這項限制的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.

The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> starts with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以泛空白字元開頭，或者含有斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="securityContextSource" /> was not one of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="securityContextSource" /> 的值不是其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 將用來存取動態組件的模式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory where the assembly will be saved.
trans-unit.target: 將儲存組件的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <c>dir</c> is <see langword="null" />, the directory defaults to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>dir</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，目錄會預設為目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The evidence supplied for the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供給動態組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The evidence is used unaltered as the final set of evidence used for policy resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此辨識項的使用不變，與用於原則解析的最終辨識項集合相同。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, storage directory, and evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式、儲存目錄和辨識項來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供其`evidence`定義動態時<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>。

trans-unit.source: The runtime will map the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> through the security policy to determine the granted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段會將對應<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>透過安全性原則，以判斷授與權限。

trans-unit.source: Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`.
trans-unit.target: 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供 null `evidence`。

trans-unit.source: If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> to the dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> being defined and marks policy as resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果`evidence`是`null`，執行階段將複製的權限集合，也就是目前授與及拒絕呼叫者的集合，<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>來動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>所定義，並標示為已解決的原則。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> was saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>會儲存到磁碟，後續的載入時，會與位置關聯的原則為基礎的授與其中<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>已儲存。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該只可用來在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並且包含的動態組件的辨識項<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`.

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: to load an assembly with evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項載入組件。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 將用來存取動態組件的模式。

trans-unit.target: 必要的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: The optional permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的權限要求。

trans-unit.target: 拒絕的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, and permission requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式和權限要求來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不會使用，除非已儲存並載入記憶體的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> object.
trans-unit.target: 不會儲存到磁碟，請使用多載的暫時性組件的指定權限要求<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項也會為要求的權限，並提供為<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>物件。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並且包含的動態組件的辨識項<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`.

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.target: 將儲存動態組件的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <c>dir</c> is <see langword="null" />, the current directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>dir</c> 是 <see langword="null" />，就會使用目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to synchronize the creation of modules, types, and members in the dynamic assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在動態組件中同步建立模組、類型和成員，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable list of attributes to be applied to the assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if there are no attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到組件的可列舉屬性清單，如果沒有任何屬性，則是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, storage directory, and synchronization option.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式、儲存目錄和同步處理選項來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法多載來指定無法正常運作除非建立動態組件時，它們會套用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes such as <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute> and <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created.
trans-unit.target: 例如，安全性等屬性時<xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute>和<xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute>無法正常運作如果建立動態組件之後加入。

trans-unit.source: If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> will be synchronized: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.AddResourceFile%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，產生的下列方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>將同步處理： <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.AddResourceFile%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些方法的兩個不同的執行緒上呼叫，其中一個會封鎖直到另完成為止。

trans-unit.source: The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are used only if `evidence` is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`才會使用`evidence`也提供，或如果儲存動態組件，並載入記憶體。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您包含<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`。

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can supply their `evidence` when defining a dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供其`evidence`定義動態時<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>。

trans-unit.source: The runtime will map the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> through the security policy to determine the granted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段會將對應<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>透過安全性原則，以判斷授與權限。

trans-unit.source: Partially trusted callers must supply a null `evidence`.
trans-unit.target: 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供 null `evidence`。

trans-unit.source: If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets, that is, the current grant and deny sets, from the caller's <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> to the dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> being defined and marks policy as resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果`evidence`是`null`，執行階段將複製的權限集合，也就是目前授與及拒絕呼叫者的集合，<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>來動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>所定義，並標示為已解決的原則。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies associated with the location where the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> was saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>會儲存到磁碟，後續的載入時，會與位置關聯的原則為基礎的授與其中<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>已儲存。

trans-unit.source: This method should only be used to define a dynamic assembly in the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應該只可用來在目前的應用程式定義域中定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method and <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法和<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> begins with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以空白字元開頭，或者包含正斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: to load an assembly with evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項載入組件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 將用來存取動態組件的模式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory where the assembly will be saved.
trans-unit.target: 將儲存組件的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <c>dir</c> is <see langword="null" />, the directory defaults to the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>dir</c> 為 <see langword="null" />，目錄會預設為目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The required permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 必要的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: The optional permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: The refused permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly using the specified name, access mode, storage directory, and permission requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式、儲存目錄和權限要求來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: The permission requests specified for `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` are not used unless the dynamic assembly has been saved and reloaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`不會使用，除非已儲存並載入記憶體的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: To specify permission requests for a transient assembly that is never saved to disk, use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence as well as requested permissions, and supply an <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> object.
trans-unit.target: 不會儲存到磁碟，請使用多載的暫時性組件的指定權限要求<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項也會為要求的權限，並提供為<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>物件。

trans-unit.source: During the development of code that emits dynamic assemblies, it is recommended that you use an overload of the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method that specifies evidence and permissions, supply the evidence you want the dynamic assembly to have, and include <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> in `refusedPermissions`.
trans-unit.target: 在開發期間發出動態組件的程式碼，建議您使用的多載<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法所指定的辨識項和權限，提供您想要並且包含的動態組件的辨識項<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>中`refusedPermissions`.

trans-unit.source: Including <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification> in the `refusedPermissions` parameter ensures that the MSIL is verified.
trans-unit.target: 包括<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification>中`refusedPermissions`參數可確保已驗證的 MSIL。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼搭配使用時擲回。

trans-unit.source: If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> will be synchronized: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.AddResourceFile%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，產生的下列方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>將同步處理： <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.AddResourceFile%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other completes.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些方法的兩個不同的執行緒上呼叫，其中一個會封鎖直到另完成為止。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A> method and <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly%2A>方法和<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> begins with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以空白字元開頭，或者包含正斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: to load an assembly with evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項載入組件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: The unique identity of the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件的唯一識別。

trans-unit.source: The mode in which the dynamic assembly will be accessed.
trans-unit.target: 將用來存取動態組件的模式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the directory where the dynamic assembly will be saved.
trans-unit.target: 將儲存動態組件的目錄名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <c>dir</c> is <see langword="null" />, the current directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>dir</c> 是 <see langword="null" />，就會使用目前的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The evidence that is supplied for the dynamic assembly.
trans-unit.target: 提供給動態組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The evidence is used unaltered as the final set of evidence used for policy resolution.
trans-unit.target: 此辨識項的使用不變，與用於原則解析的最終辨識項集合相同。

trans-unit.source: The required permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 必要的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: The optional permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 選擇性的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: The refused permissions request.
trans-unit.target: 拒絕的權限要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to synchronize the creation of modules, types, and members in the dynamic assembly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在動態組件中同步建立模組、類型和成員，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An enumerable list of attributes to be applied to the assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if there are no attributes.
trans-unit.target: 要套用到組件的可列舉屬性清單，如果沒有任何屬性，則是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Defines a dynamic assembly with the specified name, access mode, storage directory, evidence, permission requests, synchronization option, and custom attributes.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱、存取模式、儲存目錄、辨識項、權限要求、同步選項及自訂屬性來定義動態組件。

trans-unit.source: A dynamic assembly with the specified name and features.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定名稱和功能的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method overload to specify attributes that do not work correctly unless they are applied when a dynamic assembly is created.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個方法多載來指定無法正常運作除非建立動態組件時，它們會套用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes such as <xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute> and <xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute> do not work correctly if they are added after a dynamic assembly has been created.
trans-unit.target: 例如，安全性等屬性時<xref:System.Security.SecurityTransparentAttribute>和<xref:System.Security.SecurityCriticalAttribute>無法正常運作如果建立動態組件之後加入。

trans-unit.source: The permission requests specified for the `requiredPermissions`, `optionalPermissions`, and `refusedPermissions` parameters are used only if the `evidence` parameter is also supplied, or if the dynamic assembly is saved and reloaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定的權限要求`requiredPermissions`， `optionalPermissions`，和`refusedPermissions`參數，才使用`evidence`也提供參數，或如果儲存動態組件，並載入記憶體。

trans-unit.source: When you develop code that emits dynamic assemblies, we recommend that you include the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType> flag in the `refusedPermissions` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當您開發發出動態組件的程式碼時，我們建議您包含<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.SkipVerification?displayProperty=nameWithType>加上旗標`refusedPermissions`參數。

trans-unit.source: The inclusion of this flag ensures that the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) will be verified.
trans-unit.target: 納入這個旗標，可確保的 Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL)，即會驗證。

trans-unit.source: This technique will detect the unintentional generation of unverifiable code, which otherwise is very difficult to detect.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術會偵測到無法驗證的程式碼，否則這可能會很難偵測到不小心產生。

trans-unit.source: A limitation of this technique is that it also causes <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> to be thrown when it is used with code that demands full trust.
trans-unit.target: 這項技術的限制是，它也會使<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>要求完全信任的程式碼使用它時擲回。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can supply evidence when defining a dynamic <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以提供辨識項時定義動態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>。

trans-unit.source: The runtime maps the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> through the security policy to determine the granted permissions.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段對應<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>透過安全性原則，以判斷授與權限。

trans-unit.source: Partially trusted callers must supply `null` for the `evidence` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 部分信任的呼叫端必須提供`null`如`evidence`參數。

trans-unit.source: If `evidence` is `null`, the runtime copies the permission sets (that is, the current grant and deny sets) from the caller's assembly to the dynamic assembly that is being defined, and marks the policy as resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果`evidence`是`null`，執行階段將權限集合 （也就是，目前的授與及拒絕集） 從呼叫者的組件複製到正在定義，並將原則標記為已解決的動態組件。

trans-unit.source: If the dynamic assembly is saved to disk, subsequent loads will get grants based on policies that are associated with the location where the dynamic assembly was saved.
trans-unit.target: 如果在動態組件會儲存至磁碟，則後續載入時，會授與儲存動態組件的位置與相關聯的原則為基礎。

trans-unit.source: If `isSynchronized` is `true`, the following methods of the resulting <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder> will be synchronized: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.AddResourceFile%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule%2A>, <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>, and <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`isSynchronized`是`true`，產生的下列方法<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder>將同步處理： <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicModule%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.DefineResource%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.AddResourceFile%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.GetDynamicModule%2A>， <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.SetEntryPoint%2A>，和<xref:System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If two of these methods are called on different threads, one will block until the other is completed.
trans-unit.target: 如果這些方法的兩個不同的執行緒上呼叫，其中一個會封鎖直到另完成為止。

trans-unit.source: This method overload is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 中引進這個方法多載[!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see langword="Name" /> property of <paramref name="name" /> starts with white space, or contains a forward or backward slash.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 的 <see langword="Name" /> 屬性以泛空白字元開頭，或者含有斜線或反斜線。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: to load an assembly with evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用辨識項載入組件。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that specifies a method to call.
trans-unit.target: 指定要呼叫之方法的委派。

trans-unit.source: Executes the code in another application domain that is identified by the specified delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的委派所識別的其他應用程式定義域中執行程式碼。

trans-unit.source: `callBackDelegate` can specify a marshal-by-value, <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, or <xref:System.ContextBoundObject>.
trans-unit.target: `callBackDelegate` 可以指定封送處理傳值方式， <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，或<xref:System.ContextBoundObject>。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates using a static <xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用靜態<xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates using the <xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A> method by value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A>方法的值。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates using the <xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A> method by reference.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.DoCallBack%2A>所參考的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="callBackDelegate" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="callBackDelegate" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the domain manager that was provided by the host when the application domain was initialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得在已經初始化應用程式定義域時，由主應用程式提供的定義域管理員。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the domain manager provided by the host when the application domain was initialized, or <see langword="null" /> if no domain manager was provided.
trans-unit.target: 物件，表示在已經初始化應用程式定義域時，由主應用程式提供的定義域管理員；如果未提供任何定義域管理員，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged host of the common language runtime (CLR) can provide a domain manager.
trans-unit.target: 受管理的主機，common language runtime (CLR) 可以提供網域管理員。

trans-unit.source: The domain manager can participate in initializing the new application domain and supply other managers, such as a <xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>, that participate in the operations of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 網域管理員可以參與初始化新的應用程式定義域，並提供其他管理員，例如<xref:System.Security.HostSecurityManager>，參與應用程式定義域的作業。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> is about to be unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 發生於將要卸載 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> delegate for this event can perform any termination activities before the application domain is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler>委派這個事件可以在應用程式網域卸載之前執行任何終止活動。

trans-unit.source: Each application domain that needs to perform processing when it is unloaded should register an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式定義域中需要執行處理卸載時應該註冊此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: A shared event handler should not be used, because the <xref:System.EventHandler> delegate does not identify the domain that is being unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用共用的事件處理常式，因為<xref:System.EventHandler>委派不會識別正在卸載的網域。

trans-unit.source: This event is never raised in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 預設應用程式定義域中永遠不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: Do not make assumptions about the thread the event is raised on.
trans-unit.target: 請勿在執行緒引發事件的相關假設。

trans-unit.source: The event can be raised on a different thread than the one that called the <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可能比呼叫不同的執行緒上引發此事件<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得組件解析程式用來探查動態建立之組件的目錄。

trans-unit.source: The directory that the assembly resolver uses to probe for dynamically created assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 組件解析程式用來探查以動態建立組件的目錄。

trans-unit.source: To set the dynamic directory, assign a base directory path to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object that will be used to create the new application domain.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定動態目錄，將指定之基底目錄路徑<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>將用來建立新的應用程式定義域的物件。

trans-unit.source: The base directory path you assign to the property is modified by the addition of a subdirectory whose simple name is the hash code of the string you assign to the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, so the format of the base directory is *original path*\\*hash code*.
trans-unit.target: 修改指派給屬性的基底目錄路徑的簡單名稱是指派給字串的雜湊程式碼的子目錄<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，因此基底目錄的格式是*原始路徑* \\*雜湊碼*。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic directory is a subdirectory of this base directory.
trans-unit.target: 動態目錄是此基底目錄的子目錄。

trans-unit.source: Its simple name is the value of the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, so its format is *original path*\\*hash code*\\*application name*.
trans-unit.target: 其簡單的名稱為的值<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，因此其格式是*原始路徑*\\*雜湊碼*\\*應用程式名稱*。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an application domain with a directory for dynamic assemblies, emits a dynamic assembly and stores it in the dynamic directory, and then loads the assembly into the new application domain and uses it.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例與目錄的應用程式定義域建立動態組件、 發出動態組件並將它儲存在動態目錄中，對新的應用程式定義域載入組件然後使用它。

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object and sets its <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property to "Example" and its <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property to "C:\DynamicAssemblyDir".
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>物件，然後設定其<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>「 範例 」 的屬性和其<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>"C:\DynamicAssemblyDir"的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The example then displays the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property, to show that the hash code of the application name has been appended as a subdirectory of the path that was originally assigned.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>屬性，以顯示應用程式名稱的雜湊碼，做為原本指派路徑的子目錄已附加。

trans-unit.source: The base directory in this example is intended to be outside the probing path for the example application.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中的基底目錄就是要外之探查路徑中的範例應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to compile the example in a different location.
trans-unit.target: 請務必編譯此範例中不同的位置。

trans-unit.source: Delete the base directory and all its subdirectories each time you run the example.
trans-unit.target: 刪除基底目錄和其所有子目錄每次您執行範例。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a new application domain, using the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> object.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立新的應用程式定義域中，使用<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>物件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A> property to retrieve the name of the directory, so it can create the directory.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A>屬性來擷取目錄的名稱，因此它可以建立該目錄。

trans-unit.source: (The example could just as easily create the directory beforehand by concatenating the original path, the hash code of the application name, and the application name.)
trans-unit.target: （此範例無法輕鬆地建立目錄事先藉由串連的原始路徑，雜湊程式碼的應用程式名稱，而應用程式名稱）。

trans-unit.source: The example has a `GenerateDynamicAssembly` method that emits an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and stores it in the new application domain's dynamic directory.
trans-unit.target: 此範例包含`GenerateDynamicAssembly`方法發出的組件名為`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`並將它儲存在新的應用程式定義域動態目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic assembly contains one type, `HelloWorld`, that has a static method (`Shared` method in Visual Basic) named `HelloFromAD`.
trans-unit.target: 動態組件包含一種類型， `HelloWorld`，具有靜態方法 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中的方法) 名為`HelloFromAD`。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method displays the name of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法會顯示應用程式網域的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `Example` class derives from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, so the example can create an instance of the class in the new application domain and call its `Test` method.
trans-unit.target: `Example`類別衍生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，因此此範例可以建立類別的執行個體中的新應用程式定義域和呼叫其`Test`方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Test` method loads the dynamic assembly by its display name and calls the static `HelloFromAD` method.
trans-unit.target: `Test`方法會依其顯示名稱載入的動態組件，並呼叫靜態`HelloFromAD`方法。

trans-unit.source: You can show that the dynamic directory is searched after the normal probing paths by writing code for an assembly named `DynamicHelloWorld.dll` and compiling it in the same directory as this example.
trans-unit.target: 您可以顯示動態目錄搜尋一般探查路徑之後，撰寫程式碼組件名為`DynamicHelloWorld.dll`及編譯此範例中的相同目錄中。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must have a class named `HelloWorld` with a static method named `HelloFromAD`.
trans-unit.target: 組件必須具有名為類別`HelloWorld`的靜態方法，名為`HelloFromAD`。

trans-unit.source: This method does not have to have the same functionality as the one in the example; it can simply display a string to the console.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不需要具有相同的功能與在範例中。它只可以在主控台中顯示字串。

trans-unit.source: The assembly must also have an <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyVersionAttribute> attribute that sets its version to 1.0.0.0.

trans-unit.source: for access to read from a file or directory, and for access to the information in the path itself.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取從檔案或目錄，以及在本身的路徑資訊的存取權的存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />。

trans-unit.source: for reading a URI that does not begin with "file://".
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取不是以"file:// 開頭的 URI。

trans-unit.source: to execute a console application.
trans-unit.target: 執行主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains the assembly to execute.
trans-unit.target: 包含要執行之組件的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: The supplied evidence for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的提供辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to the entry point of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的進入點引數。

trans-unit.source: Represents the value of the computed hash code.
trans-unit.target: 表示計算出來的雜湊碼的值。

trans-unit.source: Represents the hash algorithm used by the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 表示組件資訊清單所使用的雜湊演算法。

trans-unit.source: Executes the assembly contained in the specified file, using the specified evidence, arguments, hash value, and hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的辨識項、引數、雜湊值和雜湊演算法，執行包含在指定檔案中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the entry point of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的進入點所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header.
trans-unit.target: 組件會開始在.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點執行。

trans-unit.source: This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會建立新的處理序或應用程式定義域，並不會在新的執行緒上執行的進入點方法。

trans-unit.source: This method loads assemblies using the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會載入組件使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can also execute assemblies using the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method, which loads assemblies using the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以執行使用的組件<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法，載入組件使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Thefollowing sample demonstrates using one of the overloads of <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A> on two different domains.
trans-unit.target: ︰ 範例將示範如何使用其中一個多載的<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>兩個不同網域上。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyFile" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，而 <paramref name="assemblyFile" /> 是使用更新的版本所編譯。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assemblySecurity" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblySecurity" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When legacy CAS policy is not enabled, <paramref name="assemblySecurity" /> should be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 若未啟用舊版 CAS 原則，<paramref name="assemblySecurity" /> 應為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 執行組件。

trans-unit.source: The display name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes an assembly given its display name.
trans-unit.target: 執行需提供其顯示名稱的組件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the entry point of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的進入點所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method provides similar functionality to the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A> method, but specifies the assembly by display name or <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> rather than by file location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法會提供類似的功能<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>方法，但指定的組件的顯示名稱或<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>而不是檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> loads assemblies with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method rather than with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>載入組件與<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header.
trans-unit.target: 組件會開始在.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點執行。

trans-unit.source: This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會建立新的處理序或應用程式定義域，並不會在新的執行緒上執行的進入點方法。

trans-unit.source: To create the <xref:System.AppDomain> to load and execute, use the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.AppDomain>載入和執行，請使用<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The specified assembly has no entry point.
trans-unit.target: 指定的組件不具任何進入點。

trans-unit.source: for access to read from a file or directory, for access to the information in the path itself, and for redirecting a display name to a path.
trans-unit.target: 針對從檔案或目錄，讓存取本身，在路徑中的資訊，並將顯示名稱重新導向到路徑的讀取權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />。

trans-unit.target: 用於存取網站時的顯示名稱會被重新導向至的 URL。

trans-unit.source: to execute a console application.
trans-unit.target: 執行主控台應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> object representing the name of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 物件，代表組件的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments to pass when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: 啟動處理程序時要傳遞的命令列引數。

trans-unit.source: Executes the assembly given an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" />, using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的引數，執行具有指定之 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 的組件。

trans-unit.source: The value that is returned by the entry point of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的進入點所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method provides similar functionality to the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A> method, but specifies the assembly by display name or <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> rather than by file location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法會提供類似的功能<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>方法，但指定的組件的顯示名稱或<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>而不是檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> loads assemblies with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method rather than with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>載入組件與<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header.
trans-unit.target: 組件會開始在.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點執行。

trans-unit.source: This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread.

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 所指定的組件不是有效的組件。

<paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version of the common language runtime than the version that is currently loaded.

trans-unit.source: Executes an assembly given its display name, using the specified evidence.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之辨識項，執行需提供其顯示名稱的組件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the entry point of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的進入點所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method provides similar functionality to the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A> method, but specifies the assembly by display name or <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> rather than by file location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法會提供類似的功能<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>方法，但指定的組件的顯示名稱或<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>而不是檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> loads assemblies with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method rather than with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>載入組件與<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A>方法。
