trans-unit.target: 組件會開始在.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法不會建立新的處理序或應用程式定義域，並不會在新的執行緒上執行的進入點方法。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method with an <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> parameter, pieces of evidence are merged.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>合併片段的辨識項的參數。

trans-unit.source: Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader.
trans-unit.target: 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。

trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 所指定的組件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly specified by <paramref name="assemblyName" /> was found, but could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 已找到 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 所指定的組件，但無法載入。

trans-unit.source: The assembly specified by <paramref name="assemblyName" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 所指定的組件不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assemblyName" /> was compiled with a later version of the common language runtime than the version that is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 用以編譯 <paramref name="assemblyName" /> 的通用語言執行平台，其版本比目前所載入的版本還要更新。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.

trans-unit.target: 指定的組件不具任何進入點。

trans-unit.source: for access to read from a file or directory, for access to the information in the path itself, and for redirecting a display name to a path.

trans-unit.source: Evidence for loading the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 用於載入組件的辨識項。

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments to pass when starting the process.
trans-unit.target: 啟動處理程序時要傳遞的命令列引數。

trans-unit.source: Executes the assembly given an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" />, using the specified evidence and arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定之辨識項和引數，執行需提供 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 的組件。

trans-unit.source: The value returned by the entry point of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件的進入點所傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method provides similar functionality to the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A> method, but specifies the assembly by display name or <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> rather than by file location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法會提供類似的功能<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssembly%2A>方法，但指定的組件的顯示名稱或<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>而不是檔案的位置。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> loads assemblies with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A> method rather than with the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>載入組件與<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A>方法，而非<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The assembly begins executing at the entry point specified in the .NET Framework header.
trans-unit.target: 組件會開始在.NET Framework 標頭中指定的進入點執行。

trans-unit.source: This method does not create a new process or application domain, and it does not execute the entry point method on a new thread.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會建立新的處理序或應用程式定義域，並不會在新的執行緒上執行的進入點方法。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method with an <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> parameter, pieces of evidence are merged.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法<xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>合併片段的辨識項的參數。

trans-unit.source: Pieces of evidence supplied as an argument to the <xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A> method supersede pieces of evidence supplied by the loader.
trans-unit.target: 做為引數提供的辨識項的片段<xref:System.AppDomain.ExecuteAssemblyByName%2A>方法取代載入器所提供的辨識項的片段。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an exception is thrown in managed code, before the runtime searches the call stack for an exception handler in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 發生於執行階段在呼叫堆疊中搜尋應用程式定義域的例外狀況處理常式之前，在 Managed 程式碼中擲回例外狀況時。

trans-unit.source: This event is only a notification.
trans-unit.target: 此事件是只有通知。

trans-unit.source: Handling this event does not handle the exception or affect subsequent exception handling in any way.
trans-unit.target: 處理這個事件不會處理此例外狀況或會影響後續的例外狀況以任何方式處理。

trans-unit.source: After the event has been raised and event handlers have been invoked, the common language runtime (CLR) begins to search for a handler for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 在引發事件，並已叫用事件處理常式之後，common language runtime (CLR) 會開始搜尋的例外狀況處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> provides the application domain with a first chance to examine any managed exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> 應用程式定義域提供第一個有機會檢查任何 managed 例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The event can be handled per application domain.
trans-unit.target: 每個應用程式定義域可以處理事件。

trans-unit.source: If a thread passes through multiple application domains while executing a call, the event is raised in each application domain that has registered an event handler, before the CLR begins searching for a matching exception handler in that application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒通過時執行呼叫的多個應用程式定義域，CLR 開始搜尋應用程式定義域中相符的例外狀況處理常式之前，已註冊的事件處理常式中，每個應用程式定義域中引發事件。

trans-unit.source: After the event has been handled, a search is made for a matching exception handler in that application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在處理事件之後，搜尋會針對應用程式定義域中相符的例外狀況處理常式。

trans-unit.source: If none is found, the event is raised in the next application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到下, 一個應用程式定義域中引發事件。

trans-unit.source: You must handle all exceptions that occur in the event handler for the <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> event.
trans-unit.target: 您必須處理所有例外狀況發生在事件處理常式的<xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException>事件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> is raised recursively.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException>遞迴引發。

trans-unit.source: This could result in a stack overflow and termination of the application.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會導致堆疊溢位和應用程式終止。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you implement event handlers for this event as constrained execution regions (CERs), to keep infrastructure-related exceptions such as out-of-memory or stack overflow from affecting the virtual machine while the exception notification is being processed.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您為限制的執行區域 (Cer)，實作此事件的事件處理常式，以防止基礎結構相關例外狀況，例如記憶體不足或堆疊溢位例外狀況通知時，會影響虛擬機器正在處理中。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised for exceptions that indicate corruption of process state, such as access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 不會引發這個事件的例外狀況，表示損毀的程序的狀態，例如存取違規，除非此事件處理常式為安全性關鍵的而且有<xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while this notification event is being handled.
trans-unit.target: 在處理此通知事件時，common language runtime 會暫止執行緒中止。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a series of application domains named `AD0` through `AD3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立名為應用程式定義域的一系列`AD0`透過`AD3`，與`Worker`每個應用程式定義域中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain.
trans-unit.target: 每個`Worker`物件具有參考`Worker`物件中下一個應用程式定義域中，除了`Worker`最後一個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> event is handled in all application domains except `AD1`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException>以外的所有應用程式網域中處理事件`AD1`。

trans-unit.source: In addition to this example, which demonstrates first-chance exception notifications in multiple application domains, you can find simple use cases in [How to: Receive First-Chance Exception Notifications](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md).
trans-unit.target: 除了本範例，示範如何在多個應用程式定義域中的第一個出現的例外狀況通知，您可以找到簡單的使用案例仍在[如何： 接收 First-chance 例外狀況通知](~/docs/framework/app-domains/how-to-receive-first-chance-exception-notifications.md)。

trans-unit.source: When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first application domain.
trans-unit.target: 預設應用程式定義域時已建立應用程式定義域，呼叫`TestException`方法的第一個應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next application domain, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled.
trans-unit.target: 每個`Worker`物件會呼叫`TestException`方法下一步的應用程式定義域，直到最後一個`Worker`擲回的例外狀況處理，或未處理的。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain.
trans-unit.target: 因此，目前的執行緒通過所有應用程式定義域，並`TestException`加入至每個應用程式定義域中的堆疊。

trans-unit.source: When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> event is raised only in the last application domain.
trans-unit.target: 當最後一個`Worker`物件會處理例外狀況，<xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException>只有在最後一個應用程式定義域引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 其他應用程式定義域永遠不會有機會處理例外狀況，因此不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the <xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException> event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 當最後一個`Worker`物件不會處理例外狀況，<xref:System.AppDomain.FirstChanceException>每個應用程式定義域中具有事件處理常式就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 每個事件處理常式已完成之後，會繼續堆疊回溯直到預設應用程式定義域攔截例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看如何堆疊顯示隨著接近引發事件並使其更接近預設應用程式定義域，變更`e.Exception.Message`至`e.Exception`中`FirstChanceHandler`事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，當`TestException`稱為跨應用程式網域界限，會出現兩次： 一次來進行 proxy 和虛設常式一次。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the friendly name of this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式定義域的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個應用程式定義域的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The friendly name of the default application domain is the file name of the process executable.
trans-unit.target: 預設應用程式定義域的易記名稱是處理程序可執行檔的檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the executable used to start the process is `"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`, the friendly name of the default application domain is `"MyAssembly.exe"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用來啟動處理程序的可執行檔是`"c:\MyAppDirectory\MyAssembly.exe"`，預設應用程式定義域的易記名稱是`"MyAssembly.exe"`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A> property to get the friendly name of the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.AppDomain.FriendlyName%2A>屬性來取得目前應用程式定義域的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: For the default application domain, the friendly name is the name of the application's executable file.
trans-unit.target: 預設應用程式定義域的易記名稱會是應用程式的可執行檔的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The code example also displays additional information about the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會顯示應用程式定義域有關的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assemblies that have been loaded into the execution context of this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得已載入至這個應用程式定義域之執行內容的組件。

trans-unit.source: An array of assemblies in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個應用程式定義域中的組件陣列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A> method to get a list of all assemblies that have been loaded into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A>方法來取得已載入至應用程式定義域的所有組件清單。

trans-unit.source: The assemblies are then displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 組件隨即顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: To run this code example, you need to create an assembly named `CustomLibrary.dll`, or change the assembly name that is passed to the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個程式碼範例，您必須建立名為組件`CustomLibrary.dll`，或變更組件名稱傳遞給<xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current thread identifier.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的執行緒識別項。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer that is the identifier of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數 (Signed Integer)，其為目前執行緒的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property, which is stable even when the .NET Framework is hosted by an environment that supports fibers (that is, lightweight threads).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Threading.Thread.ManagedThreadId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性，也就是穩定即使當.NET Framework 由支援 fiber （也就是輕量型執行緒） 的環境。

trans-unit.source: to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of a predefined application domain property, or the name of an application domain property you have defined.
trans-unit.target: 預先定義的應用程式定義域屬性的名稱，或是已經定義的應用程式定義域屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value stored in the current application domain for the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 針對指定之名稱取得儲存在目前應用程式定義域中的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="name" /> property, or <see langword="null" /> if the property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 屬性的值；如果這個屬性不存在，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to retrieve the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來擷取值的描述屬性的這個執行個體的名稱資料組的內部快取中的項目<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: Note that the comparison of `name` with the name of key-value pairs is case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，比較的`name`具有索引鍵-值組的名稱會區分大小寫。

trans-unit.source: The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created.
trans-unit.target: 快取會自動包含預先定義的系統建立應用程式定義域時，會插入的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can inspect their values with the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method, or the equivalent <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查其值與<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法或對等<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A> method and inspect their values with the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以插入或修改與您的使用者定義名稱資料組<xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%2A>方法，並查看其值與<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the `name` of each predefined system entry and its corresponding <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> property.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述`name`每個預先定義的系統項目和其相對應<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立新的應用程式定義域、 設定系統提供的值，並將新的值組的網域。

trans-unit.source: The example then demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method to retrieve the data from these value pairs and display them to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法來擷取這些值組的資料，並對主控台顯示它們。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: for access to the information in the path itself, if the property applies to a path.

trans-unit.target: 取得目前執行個體的類型。

trans-unit.source: The type of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets an integer that uniquely identifies the application domain within the process.
trans-unit.target: 取得可唯一識別處理程序中之應用程式定義域的整數。

trans-unit.source: An integer that identifies the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 可識別應用程式定義域的整數。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立第二個應用程式定義域，並顯示預設網域與新網域的相關資訊。

trans-unit.target: 藉由防止建立租用 (Lease)，為 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 提供無限的存留期。

trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The compatibility switch to test.
trans-unit.target: 要測試的相容性參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets a nullable Boolean value that indicates whether any compatibility switches are set, and if so, whether the specified compatibility switch is set.
trans-unit.target: 取得可為 Null 的布林值，這個值表示是否已設定任何相容性參數，如果已設定，是否已設定指定的相容性參數。

trans-unit.source: A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) if no compatibility switches are set; otherwise, a Boolean value that indicates whether the compatibility switch that is specified by <paramref name="value" /> is set.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定任何相容性參數則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)；否則為布林值，以表示是否已設定 <paramref name="value" /> 所指定之相容性參數。

trans-unit.source: This method tests whether the specified compatibility switch has been set for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會測試是否已針對目前的應用程式定義域設定指定的相容性參數。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility switches typically restore a behavior (such as the way strings are sorted) that was changed between versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 相容性參數通常還原行為 （例如排序方式字串），.NET Framework 版本之間變更。

trans-unit.source: They are set by calling the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetCompatibilitySwitches%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method before creating an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫設定<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.SetCompatibilitySwitches%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，然後再建立應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The following table provides examples of compatibility switches that can be set to restore the behavior of earlier versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 下表提供可以還原舊版.NET Framework 的行為設定的相容性參數的範例。

trans-unit.source: Switch
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: 意義

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy"

trans-unit.source: Code access security (CAS) for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼存取安全性 (CAS)[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]啟用這個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: See [<NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ <NetFx40_LegacySecurityPolicy>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/netfx40-legacysecuritypolicy-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_Legacy20SortingBehavior"

trans-unit.source: String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] are enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 排序的預設值的字串[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]這個應用程式定義域中已啟用。

trans-unit.source: Its success requires sort00001000.dll to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 它的成功與否需要 sort00001000.dll 安裝。

trans-unit.source: See [<CompatSortNLSVersion> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ <CompatSortNLSVersion>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/compatsortnlsversion-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_Legacy40SortingBehavior"

trans-unit.source: String sorting defaults for the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]and Unicode 5.0 are enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 排序的預設值的字串[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]而且 Unicode 5.0 已啟用這個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: Its success requires sort00060101.dll to be installed.
trans-unit.target: 它的成功與否需要 sort00060101.dll 安裝。

trans-unit.source: "NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"
trans-unit.target: "NetFx40_TimeSpanLegacyFormatMode"

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.TimeSpan> formatting behavior for the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] is enabled in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan> 格式化行為[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]啟用這個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: See [<TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md) and the "Restoring Legacy TimeSpan Formatting" section of the <xref:System.TimeSpan> topic.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ <TimeSpan_LegacyFormatMode>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/timespan-legacyformatmode-element.md)和 「 還原舊版 TimeSpan 格式 」 的區段<xref:System.TimeSpan>主題。

trans-unit.source: "UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"
trans-unit.target: "UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm"

trans-unit.source: The runtime calculates hash codes for strings on a per application domain basis instead of using a single hashing algorithm that produces a consistent hash code across application domains.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段計算字串的雜湊程式碼上每個應用程式網域為基礎，而不是使用單一的雜湊演算法產生一致的雜湊程式碼在應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: See [<UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm> Element](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[ <UseRandomizedStringHashAlgorithm>元素](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/userandomizedstringhashalgorithm-element.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the application domain is the default application domain for the process.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出應用程式定義域是否為該處理程序的預設應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> object represents the default application domain for the process; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 物件代表處理程序的預設應用程式定義域，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Every managed process has a default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 每個受管理的程序具有預設應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Execution begins in the default domain.
trans-unit.target: 在 預設網域，開始執行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a second application domain and displays information about the default domain and the new domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立第二個應用程式定義域，並顯示預設網域與新網域的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this application domain is unloading, and the objects it contains are being finalized by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 指示這個應用程式定義域是否正在卸載，以及其包含的物件是否正在由 Common Language Runtime 進行最終處理。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this application domain is unloading and the common language runtime has started invoking finalizers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個應用程式定義域正在卸載且 Common Language Runtime 已開始叫用完成項，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The finalization method for an object provides you an opportunity to perform any necessary cleanup operations before the object is garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 物件的最終處理方法會提供物件的記憶體回收之前執行任何必要的清除作業的機會。

trans-unit.source: After finalization, the object is accessible but in an invalid state and therefore unusable.
trans-unit.target: 最終處理物件之後存取，但處於無效狀態，因此無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Eventually, garbage collection completes and reclaims the object.
trans-unit.target: 最後，記憶體回收完成，並回收物件。

trans-unit.source: An object's finalization method is called in one of the following situations: during garbage collection, when the common language runtime is shutting down, or when the application domain that contains the object is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 物件的最終處理方法會呼叫其中一種在下列情況： 記憶體回收期間，當正在關閉通用語言執行平台，或包含物件的應用程式定義域卸載時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.IsFinalizingForUnload%2A> method returns `true` only in the last case; it does not return `true` if finalization results from routine garbage collection or from CLR shutdown.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.IsFinalizingForUnload%2A>方法會傳回`true`只能在最後一個的情況; 它不會傳回`true`如果最終處理而產生從常式回收或 CLR 關機。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether finalization is due to CLR shutdown, use the <xref:System.Environment.HasShutdownStarted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否因為 CLR 關閉而最終處理，請使用<xref:System.Environment.HasShutdownStarted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: It returns `true` if finalization is due to an application domain being unloaded or to the CLR shutting down.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回`true`最終處理是否由於應用程式定義域正在卸載或 clr 正在關閉。

trans-unit.source: While executing in your finalization method during domain unloading, you might want to access another object that is referenced by a static field and has a finalization method.
trans-unit.target: 執行時在最終處理方法定義域卸載時，可能會想要存取另一個物件參考的靜態欄位，且具有最終處理方法。

trans-unit.source: However, you cannot reliably do so because the accessed object might already have been finalized.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您無法可靠地達成因為所存取的物件可能有已完成。

trans-unit.source: An exception to this rule is the <xref:System.Console> class, which contains static fields that reference stream objects, but is implemented specially so you can always write to the system console, even during domain unloading or system shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 此規則的例外是<xref:System.Console>類別，其中包含參考資料流物件的靜態欄位，但特別讓您可以撰寫主控台中，即使在網域卸載或系統關機期間實作。

trans-unit.source: Use this method in an object's finalization method to determine whether the application domain that contains the object is unloading.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法中的物件最終處理方法，以判斷是否包含物件的應用程式定義域正在卸載。

trans-unit.source: If that is the case, you cannot reliably access any object that has a finalization method and is referenced by a static field.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，您無法可靠地存取任何物件具有最終處理方法，並由靜態欄位參考。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，該值指出載入目前應用程式定義域中的組件是否在完全信任情況下執行。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if assemblies that are loaded into the current application domain execute with full trust; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果載入目前應用程式定義域中的組件在完全信任情況下執行，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `true` for the default application domain of an application that runs on the desktop.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法一律會傳回`true`在桌面上執行的應用程式的預設應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: It returns `false` for a sandboxed application domain that was created by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload, unless the permissions that are granted to the application domain are equivalent to full trust.
trans-unit.target: 它會傳回`false`，使用所建立的沙箱化應用程式網域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載，除非應用程式定義域授與的權限相當於完全信任。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted%2A> property and the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.IsFullyTrusted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property with fully trusted and partially trusted application domains.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.IsFullyTrusted%2A>屬性和<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.IsFullyTrusted%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與完全信任和部分信任的應用程式定義域的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The fully trusted application domain is the default application domain for the application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的預設應用程式定義域的完全信任的應用程式網域。

trans-unit.source: The partially trusted application domain is created by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任的應用程式定義域由使用<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a `Worker` class that derives from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, so it can be marshaled across application domain boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用`Worker`類別衍生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，因此它可以封送處理跨應用程式定義域界限。

trans-unit.source: The example creates a `Worker` object in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立`Worker`預設應用程式定義域中的物件。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method to display the property value for the application domain and for two assemblies that are loaded into the application domain: mscorlib, which is part of the .NET Framework, and the example assembly.
trans-unit.target: 然後它會呼叫`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法，以顯示應用程式定義域和兩個組件載入至應用程式定義域的屬性值： mscorlib，是.NET Framework 中，範例組件的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The application domain is fully trusted, so both assemblies are fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式定義域是完全受信任的因此兩個組件是完全受信任。

trans-unit.source: The example creates another `Worker` object in a sandboxed application domain and again calls the `TestIsFullyTrusted` method.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會建立另一個`Worker`物件中的沙箱化應用程式定義域和再次呼叫`TestIsFullyTrusted`方法。

trans-unit.source: Mscorlib is always trusted, even in a partially trusted application domain, but the example assembly is partially trusted.
trans-unit.target: Mscorlib 永遠是受信任的即使在部分信任的應用程式網域中，但是範例組件是以部分信任。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current application domain has a set of permissions that is granted to all assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值表示目前應用程式定義域是否會授與一組權限給所有載入該應用程式定義域中的組件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current application domain has a homogenous set of permissions; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前應用程式定義域具有一組同質性權限，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` for sandboxed application domains that were created by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回`true`使用所建立的沙箱化應用程式定義域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Sandboxed application domains have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 沙箱化應用程式定義域具有一組同質性權限;也就是相同的權限集授與給所有載入應用程式定義域的部分信任組件。

trans-unit.source: A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust.
trans-unit.target: 沙箱應用程式定義域 （選擇性） 具有免套用此權限集，並改為以完全信任執行的強式名稱組件的清單。

trans-unit.source: Fully trusted code can use the <xref:System.AppDomain.PermissionSet%2A> property to determine the homogenous grant set of a sandboxed application domain.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任的程式碼可以使用<xref:System.AppDomain.PermissionSet%2A>屬性來判斷沙箱應用程式定義域的同質性的授權集。

trans-unit.source: This property also returns `true` for the default application domain of a desktop application, because that application domain grants full trust to all assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性也會傳回`true`預設應用程式定義域的桌面應用程式，因為該應用程式定義域授與完全信任給所有組件。

trans-unit.source: Loads an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> into this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 載入這個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see langword="byte" /> that is a COFF-based image containing an emitted assembly.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="byte" /> 類型的陣列，這是包含發出組件之以 COFF 為基礎的影像。

trans-unit.source: Loads the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> with a common object file format (COFF) based image containing an emitted <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />.
trans-unit.target: 載入具備通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 影像 (包含發出的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />) 的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.source: The loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: 載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級是在應用程式定義域的信任層級相同。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應用於僅將目前的應用程式定義域載入組件。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法為了方便起見提供如互通性來電者無法呼叫靜態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要將其他應用程式定義域中載入組件，使用方法例如<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 通用於所有多載，這個方法的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the use of loading a raw assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用載入原始組件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rawAssembly" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rawAssembly" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="rawAssembly" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="rawAssembly" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="rawAssembly" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前載入的是 Common Language Runtime 2.0 版或更新版本，而 <paramref name="rawAssembly" /> 是使用更新的版本所編譯。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: An assembly or module was loaded twice with two different evidences.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個不同的辨識項載入組件或模組兩次。

trans-unit.source: for access to read from a file or directory, and for access to the information in the path itself.
trans-unit.target: 用於讀取從檔案或目錄，以及在本身的路徑資訊的存取權的存取。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes the assembly to load.
trans-unit.target: 物件，描述要載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Loads an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> given its <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" />.
trans-unit.target: 載入提供了 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.AssemblyName" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.source: The loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: 載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應用於僅將目前的應用程式定義域載入組件。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法為了方便起見提供如互通性來電者無法呼叫靜態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要將其他應用程式定義域中載入組件，使用方法例如<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If a version of the requested assembly is already loaded, this method returns the loaded assembly, even if a different version is requested.
trans-unit.target: 如果已載入要求的組件的版本，這個方法會傳回載入的組件，即使要求不同的版本。

trans-unit.source: Supplying a partial assembly name for `assemblyRef` is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: 提供的部分組件名稱`assemblyRef`不建議使用。

trans-unit.source: (A partial name omits one or more of culture, version, or public key token.
trans-unit.target: （部分的名稱會省略一或多個文化特性、 版本或公開金鑰語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: For overloads that take a string instead of an <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName> object, "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0" is an example of a partial name and "MyAssembly, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=18ab3442da84b47" is an example of a full name.) Using partial names has a negative effect on performance.
trans-unit.target: 對於採用而不是字串的多載<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName>物件，"MyAssembly，Version = 1.0.0.0"是部分名稱的範例和"MyAssembly，Version = 1.0.0.0，Culture = neutral，PublicKeyToken = 18ab3442da84b47 」 是完整名稱的範例。)使用部分的名稱有對效能產生負面影響。

trans-unit.source: In addition, a partial assembly name can load an assembly from the global assembly cache only if there is an exact copy of the assembly in the application base directory (<xref:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory%2A> or <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>).
trans-unit.target: 此外，部分組件名稱可以載入組件從全域組件快取中的應用程式基底目錄的組件的完全相同複本如果 (<xref:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory%2A>或<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>)。

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.AppDomain> object represents application domain `A`, and the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A> method is called from application domain `B`, the assembly is loaded into both application domains.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前<xref:System.AppDomain>物件都代表應用程式定義域`A`，而<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A>方法從應用程式定義域呼叫`B`，組件會載入至兩個應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code loads `MyAssembly` into the new application domain `ChildDomain` and also into the application domain where the code executes:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼載入`MyAssembly`至新的應用程式定義域`ChildDomain`也到應用程式定義域執行的程式碼：

trans-unit.source: The assembly is loaded into both domains because <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> does not derive from <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>, and therefore the return value of the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A> method cannot be marshaled.
trans-unit.target: 因為組件載入至兩個網域<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly>不是衍生自<xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>，而因此傳回值的<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A>方法無法封送處理。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the common language runtime tries to load the assembly into the calling application domain.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，common language runtime 會嘗試對呼叫的應用程式定義域載入組件。

trans-unit.source: The assemblies that are loaded into the two application domains might be different if the path settings for the two application domains are different.
trans-unit.target: 組件載入至兩個應用程式定義域可能會不同，如果路徑設定為兩個應用程式網域不同。

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CodeBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are set, the first attempt to load the assembly uses the display name (including version, culture, and so on, as returned by the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property).
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性和<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CodeBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會設定，第一次嘗試載入組件會使用的顯示名稱 (包括所傳回的版本、 文化特性，依此類推，<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性)。

trans-unit.source: If the file is not found, the <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CodeBase%2A> property is used to search for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到檔案，<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CodeBase%2A>屬性用來搜尋該組件。

trans-unit.source: If the assembly is found using <xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CodeBase%2A>, the display name is matched against the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用找到的組件<xref:System.Reflection.AssemblyName.CodeBase%2A>，會針對組件比對的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: If the match fails, a <xref:System.IO.FileLoadException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果配對失敗，<xref:System.IO.FileLoadException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyRef" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="assemblyRef" />。

Version 2.0 or later of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="assemblyRef" /> was compiled with a later version.

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="P:System.Reflection.Assembly.FullName" />.

trans-unit.source: Loads an <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> given its display name.
trans-unit.target: 載入提供了顯示名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.source: The loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: 載入的組件。

trans-unit.target: 若要將其他應用程式定義域中載入組件，使用方法例如<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>。

trans-unit.target: 通用於所有多載，這個方法的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assemblyString" /> 是 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access the location of the assembly if the assembly is not local.

trans-unit.target: <see langword="byte" /> 類型的陣列，包含代表組件符號的未經處理位元組。

trans-unit.source: Loads the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> with a common object file format (COFF) based image containing an emitted <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />.
trans-unit.target: 載入具備通用物件檔案格式 (COFF) 影像 (包含發出的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />) 的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />。

trans-unit.target: 也會載入代表 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 符號且未經處理的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The loaded assembly.
trans-unit.target: 載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the trust level of an assembly that is loaded by using this method is the same as the trust level of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，使用這個方法載入的組件的信任層級是在應用程式定義域的信任層級相同。

trans-unit.source: This method should be used only to load an assembly into the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法應用於僅將目前的應用程式定義域載入組件。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided as a convenience for interoperability callers who cannot call the static <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法為了方便起見提供如互通性來電者無法呼叫靜態<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To load assemblies into other application domains, use a method such as <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要將其他應用程式定義域中載入組件，使用方法例如<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For information that is common to all overloads of this method, see the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 通用於所有多載，這個方法的資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%28System.Reflection.AssemblyName%29>方法多載。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether CPU and memory monitoring of application domains is enabled for the current process.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否對目前處理程序啟用應用程式定義域的 CPU 和記憶體監視。

trans-unit.source: Once monitoring is enabled for a process, it cannot be disabled.
trans-unit.target: 一旦對處理程序啟用監視，就不能停用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if monitoring is enabled; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用監視，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This `static` property (`Shared` property in Visual Basic) controls CPU and memory monitoring of all the application domains in the process.
trans-unit.target: 這`static`屬性 (`Shared`屬性在 Visual Basic) 控制 CPU 和記憶體監視的程序中的所有應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set this property to `false`, a <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown, even if the current value of the property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試將此屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.ArgumentException>擲回例外狀況，即使目前屬性的值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Once monitoring is enabled, you can use the <xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringSurvivedMemorySize%2A>, <xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringSurvivedProcessMemorySize%2A>, <xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringTotalAllocatedMemorySize%2A>, and <xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringTotalProcessorTime%2A> instance properties to monitor CPU and memory use of individual application domains.
trans-unit.target: 一旦啟用監視，您可以使用<xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringSurvivedMemorySize%2A>， <xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringSurvivedProcessMemorySize%2A>， <xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringTotalAllocatedMemorySize%2A>，和<xref:System.AppDomain.MonitoringTotalProcessorTime%2A>執行個體來監視個別的應用程式定義域的 CPU 和記憶體使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The current process attempted to assign the value <see langword="false" /> to this property.
trans-unit.target: 目前的處理序嘗試要指派值 <see langword="false" /> 給這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that survived the last collection and that are known to be referenced by the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得自上次回收作業後存留下來，且已知正由目前應用程式定義域參考之位元組的數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of surviving bytes.
trans-unit.target: 存留的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The statistics are updated with each garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 每次記憶體回收會更新統計資料。

trans-unit.source: However, they are guaranteed to be accurate only after a full, blocking collection; that is, a collection that includes all generations and that stops the application while collection occurs.
trans-unit.target: 不過，保證能夠精確只後執行完整的封鎖集合也就是的集合，其中包含所有層代和停止應用程式，這時集合就會發生。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.GC.Collect?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload performs a full, blocking collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.GC.Collect?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載會執行完整的封鎖集合。

trans-unit.source: (Concurrent collection occurs in the background and does not block the application.)
trans-unit.target: （同時回收就會發生在背景中且不會封鎖應用程式。）

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic中為 <see langword="Shared" />) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total bytes that survived from the last collection for all application domains in the process.
trans-unit.target: 針對處理程序中的所有應用程式定義域，取得自上次回收作業存留下來的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The total number of surviving bytes for the process.
trans-unit.target: 處理程序的存留位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: After a full, blocking collection, this number represents the number of bytes currently held live on managed heaps.
trans-unit.target: 完整的封鎖收集後，目前的位元組數目保留在即時此數字代表 managed 堆積。

trans-unit.source: It should be close to the number reported by the <xref:System.GC.GetTotalMemory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它應該接近所報告的數字<xref:System.GC.GetTotalMemory%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: After an ephemeral collection, this number represents the number of bytes currently held live in ephemeral generations.
trans-unit.target: 暫時收集之後，此數字代表的位元組數目目前保留要即時暫時層代中。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic中為 <see langword="Shared" />) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total size, in bytes, of all memory allocations that have been made by the application domain since it was created, without subtracting memory that has been collected.
trans-unit.target: 取得應用程式定義域自其建立後已配置之所有記憶體的總大小 (以位元組為單位)，但不減去已回收的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: The total size of all memory allocations.
trans-unit.target: 所有記憶體配置的總大小。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic中為 <see langword="Shared" />) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total processor time that has been used by all threads while executing in the current application domain, since the process started.
trans-unit.target: 取得自處理程序啟動後，所有執行緒在目前應用程式定義域中執行時用掉的處理器時間總計。

trans-unit.source: Total processor time for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 目前應用程式定義域的處理器時間總計。

trans-unit.source: The total time that is reported for an application domain includes the time each thread in the process spent executing in that application domain.
trans-unit.target: 總時間所報告之應用程式定義域中包含應用程式定義域中執行程序中的每個執行緒所花費的時間。

trans-unit.source: A thread that calls into unmanaged code is still associated with an application domain, and the processor time spent executing the unmanaged code is reported for the application domain where the call was made.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的執行緒仍會關聯於應用程式定義域，並執行 unmanaged 程式碼會報告已呼叫的應用程式定義域所花費的處理器時間。

trans-unit.source: When a thread is blocked or sleeping, it does not consume processor time.
trans-unit.target: 當執行緒被封鎖或睡眠中，它不會耗用處理器時間。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="static" /> (<see langword="Shared" /> in Visual Basic) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="static" /> (在 Visual Basic中為 <see langword="Shared" />) <see cref="P:System.AppDomain.MonitoringIsEnabled" /> 屬性設為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the permission set of a sandboxed application domain.
trans-unit.target: 取得沙箱應用程式定義域的權限集。

trans-unit.source: The permission set of the sandboxed application domain.
trans-unit.target: 沙箱應用程式定義域的權限集。

trans-unit.source: Sandboxed application domains that were created by using the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method overload have a homogenous set of permissions; that is, the same set of permissions is granted to all partially trusted assemblies that are loaded into the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用所建立的沙箱化應用程式定義域<xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%28System.String%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%2CSystem.AppDomainSetup%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%2CSystem.Security.Policy.StrongName%5B%5D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法多載有一組同質性權限; 也就是相同的權限集授與給所有載入應用程式定義域的部分信任組件。

trans-unit.source: A sandboxed application domain optionally has a list of strong-named assemblies that are exempt from this permission set, and instead run with full trust.
trans-unit.target: 沙箱應用程式定義域 （選擇性） 具有免套用此權限集，並改為以完全信任執行的強式名稱組件的清單。

trans-unit.source: Requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the default application domain's parent process exits.
trans-unit.target: 發生於預設應用程式定義域的父處理程序結束時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> for this event can perform termination activities, such as closing files, releasing storage and so on, before the process ends.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventHandler>針對此事件可以執行終止活動，例如關閉檔案，釋放儲存體等等，在處理序結束之前。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this event is raised in each application domain that registers an event handler.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，每個應用程式定義域中註冊事件處理常式會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The total execution time of all <xref:System.AppDomain.ProcessExit> event handlers is limited, just as the total execution time of all finalizers is limited at process shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 總執行時間的所有<xref:System.AppDomain.ProcessExit>事件處理常式是受到限制，就如同所有完成的執行時間總計是在處理序關機有限。

trans-unit.source: The default is two seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為兩秒。

trans-unit.source: An unmanaged host can change this execution time by calling the [ICLRPolicyManager::SetTimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md) method with the [OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md) enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 受管理的主機可以呼叫來變更這個執行階段[iclrpolicymanager:: Settimeout](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/iclrpolicymanager-settimeout-method.md)方法[OPR_ProcessExit](~/docs/framework/unmanaged-api/hosting/eclroperation-enumeration.md)列舉值。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event is raised only in the default application domain, and only if an event handler is registered in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，此事件是引發只在預設應用程式網域中，而且只有在預設應用程式定義域中註冊事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the resolution of an assembly fails in the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 發生於僅限反映之內容中的組件解析失敗時。

trans-unit.source: In the reflection-only context, dependencies are not resolved automatically.
trans-unit.target: 在僅限反映的內容中，會不會自動解析相依性。

trans-unit.source: They must be preloaded or returned by the handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 而且必須預先載入或傳回為這個事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when an assembly has a dependency that is not already loaded into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 當組件具有尚未載入到僅限反映的內容相依性，會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The missing dependency is specified by the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 遺失的相依性由指定<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler> for this event must return an assembly that satisfies the dependency.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler>對於這個事件必須傳回符合相依性的組件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that is returned must be loaded into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的組件必須載入到僅限反映的內容。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised only for missing dependencies of the assembly that you are loading into the reflection-only context (for example, by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.ReflectionOnlyLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method).
trans-unit.target: 僅針對遺失的相依性的組件載入僅限反映的內容會引發這個事件 (例如，藉由使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.ReflectionOnlyLoad%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法)。

trans-unit.source: It is not raised if the assembly that you are loading cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到要載入的組件時，它不會引發。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns the assembly that requested the assembly load that could not be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回要求無法解析組件載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: Knowing the identity of the requesting assembly might be useful in identifying the correct version of the dependency, if more than one version is available.
trans-unit.target: 了解要求的組件的識別可能會用來識別正確版本的相依性，如果一個以上的版本可用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For this event, the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns the assembly name before policy is applied.
trans-unit.target: 對於此事件，<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性在套用原則之前，會傳回組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Returns the assemblies that have been loaded into the reflection-only context of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 傳回已經載入到應用程式定義域之僅限反映的內容之組件。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> objects that represent the assemblies loaded into the reflection-only context of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 物件的陣列，代表已經載入到應用程式定義域中僅限反映之內容的組件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the assemblies that have been loaded into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回已載入僅限反映之內容的組件。

trans-unit.source: To get the assemblies that have been loaded for execution, use the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得已載入的組件的執行，請使用<xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example loads the System.dll assembly into the execution context and then into the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會載入 System.dll 組件至執行內容，然後放入僅限反映的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A> and <xref:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies%2A> methods are used to display the assemblies loaded into each context.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.GetAssemblies%2A>和<xref:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyGetAssemblies%2A>方法用來顯示每個內容所載入的組件。

trans-unit.source: An operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在卸載的應用程式定義域中執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets the path under the base directory where the assembly resolver should probe for private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 取得組件解析程式應該在其中探查私用組件的路徑，此路徑位於基底目錄下。

trans-unit.source: The path under the base directory where the assembly resolver should probe for private assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 組件解析程式應該在其中探查私用組件的路徑，此路徑位於基底目錄下。

trans-unit.source: Private assemblies are deployed in the same directory structure as the application.
trans-unit.target: 私用組件會部署在相同的目錄結構與應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If the path specified by the <xref:System.AppDomain.RelativeSearchPath%2A> property is not under <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果所指定的路徑<xref:System.AppDomain.RelativeSearchPath%2A>屬性不是在<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value set using <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回設定使用的值<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.PrivateBinPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path information.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the resolution of a resource fails because the resource is not a valid linked or embedded resource in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 發生於資源的解析失敗時 (原因是因為該資源在組件中不是有效連結或內嵌的資源)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler> for this event can attempt to locate the assembly containing the resource and return it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler>針對此事件可以嘗試找出包含資源的組件，並將它傳回。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised if resolution fails because no file can be found for a valid linked resource.
trans-unit.target: 如果解析失敗，因為沒有檔案找不到有效的連結資源，不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: It is raised if a manifest resource stream cannot be found, but it is not raised if an individual resource key cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到資訊清單資源資料流，但不是會引發如果找不到個別的資源索引鍵，就會引發此事件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains the assembly that requested the resource.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性包含要求之資源的組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: The security policy level.
trans-unit.target: 安全性原則層級。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the security policy level for this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 為這個應用程式定義域建立安全性原則層級。

trans-unit.source: Call this method before an assembly is loaded into the <xref:System.AppDomain> in order for the security policy to have effect.
trans-unit.target: 載入組件之前呼叫這個方法<xref:System.AppDomain>效果的安全性原則的順序。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetAppDomainPolicy%2A> method to set the security policy level of an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.SetAppDomainPolicy%2A>方法，以設定應用程式定義域的安全性原則層級。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="domainPolicy" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="domainPolicy" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The security policy level has already been set.
trans-unit.target: 安全性原則層級已經設定。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path to the shadow copy location.
trans-unit.target: 陰影複本位置的完整路徑。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the specified directory path as the location where assemblies are shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的目錄路徑建立為陰影複製組件的所在位置。

trans-unit.source: The cache path is ignored if the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A> property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 如果，則會忽略快取路徑<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ApplicationName%2A>屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.CachePath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.CachePath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information on shadow copying see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需陰影複製的詳細資訊請參閱[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: Assigns a value to an application domain property.
trans-unit.target: 將某個值指派給應用程式定義域屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user-defined application domain property to create or change.
trans-unit.target: 要建立或變更的使用者定義之應用程式定義域屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified application domain property.
trans-unit.target: 將指定值指派至指定的應用程式定義域屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert an entry, or modify the value of an entry in an internal cache of name-data pairs that describe properties of this instance of <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來插入的項目，或修改的值描述屬性的這個執行個體的名稱資料組的內部快取中的項目<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created.
trans-unit.target: 快取會自動包含預先定義的系統建立應用程式定義域時，會插入的項目。

trans-unit.source: You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method.
trans-unit.target: 您無法插入或修改使用此方法的系統項目。

trans-unit.source: A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試修改系統項目方法呼叫沒有任何作用中。此方法不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can inspect the values of system entries with the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method, or the equivalent <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> properties described in <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查與系統項目的值<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法或對等<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>屬性中所述<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>。

trans-unit.source: You can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫此方法以設定的預設逾時間隔由 「 REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"評估規則運算式模式的值做為值`name`引數和<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，表示在逾時值與間隔`data`引數。

trans-unit.source: You can also insert or modify your own user defined name-data pairs with this method and inspect their values with the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 也可以插入或修改這個方法與您自己的使用者定義名稱資料組並且檢查其值與<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29> method to create a new value pair.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.AppDomain.SetData%28System.String%2CSystem.Object%29>方法來建立新的值組。

trans-unit.source: The example then uses the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method to retrieve the value, and displays it to the console.
trans-unit.target: 然後此範例使用<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法來擷取值，並將它顯示到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The name of a user-defined application domain property to create or change.
trans-unit.target: 要建立或變更的使用者定義之應用程式定義域屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The permission to demand of the caller when the property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 當擷取屬性時，向呼叫端要求的權限。

trans-unit.source: Assigns the specified value to the specified application domain property, with a specified permission to demand of the caller when the property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之值指派給指定之應用程式定義域屬性，而當擷取這個屬性時，有指定向呼叫端要求的權限。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert or modify your own user-defined entries in an internal cache of name/data pairs that describe properties of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來插入或修改自己使用者定義的項目，描述應用程式定義域屬性的名稱/資料組的內部快取中。

trans-unit.source: When you insert an entry, you can specify a permission demand to enforce when the entry is retrieved.In addition, you can call this method to set the value of the default timeout interval for evaluating regular expression patterns by supply "REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT" as the value of the `name` argument and a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that represents the timeout interval as the value of the `data` argument.
trans-unit.target: 當您插入項目時，您可以指定權限要求來擷取項目時，強制執行。此外，您可以呼叫此方法以設定的預設逾時間隔由 「 REGEX_DEFAULT_MATCH_TIMEOUT"評估規則運算式模式的值做為值`name`引數和<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，表示做為值的逾時間隔`data`引數。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this method to assign a security demand to a system-defined property string.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個方法的安全性要求給系統定義的屬性字串。

trans-unit.source: The cache automatically contains predefined system entries that are inserted when the application domain is created.
trans-unit.target: 快取會自動包含預先定義的系統建立應用程式定義域時，會插入的項目。

trans-unit.source: You cannot insert or modify system entries with this method.
trans-unit.target: 您無法插入或修改使用此方法的系統項目。

trans-unit.source: A method call that attempts to modify a system entry has no effect; the method does not throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試修改系統項目方法呼叫沒有任何作用中。此方法不會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: You can inspect the values of system entries with the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method or the equivalent <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> properties described in the Remarks section for the <xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢查與系統項目的值<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法或對等<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>的 < 備註 > 一節所述的內容<xref:System.AppDomain.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="name" /> specifies a system-defined property string and <paramref name="permission" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="name" /> 可指定系統定義之屬性字串，且 <paramref name="permission" /> 不是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path that is the base directory for subdirectories where dynamic assemblies are stored.
trans-unit.target: 完整的路徑，代表用來儲存動態組件之子目錄的基底目錄。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the specified directory path as the base directory for subdirectories where dynamically generated files are stored and accessed.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的目錄路徑，做為存放及存取動態產生檔案之子目錄的基底目錄。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A> property of the internal <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A>屬性內部的<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>與這個執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, and should not be used for new development.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經過時，並不應該用於新的開發工作。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the non-obsolete alternative, the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用非過時的替代方式，<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of this example, see the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property or the <xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需此範例的說明，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.DynamicBase%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性或<xref:System.AppDomain.DynamicDirectory%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.PrincipalPolicy" /> values that specifies the type of the principal object to attach to threads.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.PrincipalPolicy" /> 值，指定要附加至執行緒之主體物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how principal and identity objects should be attached to a thread if the thread attempts to bind to a principal while executing in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒在這個應用程式定義域執行時嘗試繫結至主體，則指定主體和識別 (Identity) 物件應該如何附加至執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Setting this value will only be effective if you set it before using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 設定此值才會生效，如果您使用之前設定<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to a given principal (for example, a generic principal) and then use the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Security.Principal.PrincipalPolicy> to <xref:System.Security.Principal.PrincipalPolicy.WindowsPrincipal>, the current principal will remain the generic principal.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您設定<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>到指定的主體 （例如，泛型主體），然後使用<xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A>方法，以設定<xref:System.Security.Principal.PrincipalPolicy>至<xref:System.Security.Principal.PrincipalPolicy.WindowsPrincipal>，目前的主體會保留泛型主體。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the effect on threads of using the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A> method to change the principal policy of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示使用的執行緒上影響<xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A>方法，以變更應用程式定義域的主體的原則。

trans-unit.source: It also shows the effect of using the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetThreadPrincipal%2A> method to change the principal that is available for attaching to threads in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示使用的效果<xref:System.AppDomain.SetThreadPrincipal%2A>方法，以變更適用於附加至應用程式定義域中的執行緒的主體。

trans-unit.source: The operation is attempted on an unloaded application domain.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。

trans-unit.source: Turns on shadow copying.
trans-unit.target: 開啟陰影複製。

trans-unit.source: For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, and should not be used for new development.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法已經過時，並不應該用於新的開發工作。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試對卸載的應用程式定義域執行作業。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。
