trans-unit.source: A list of directory names, where each name is separated by a semicolon.
trans-unit.target: 目錄名稱的清單，其中的每個名稱以分號隔開。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the specified directory path as the location of assemblies to be shadow copied.
trans-unit.target: 建立指定的目錄路徑，做為要陰影複製的組件位置。

trans-unit.source: By default, a shadow copy includes all assemblies found through probing.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，陰影複製包含經由探查所找到的所有組件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.SetShadowCopyPath%2A> method restricts the shadow copy to the assemblies in the directories specified by `path`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.SetShadowCopyPath%2A>方法會限制所指定目錄中的組件的陰影複製`path`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.SetShadowCopyPath%2A> method does not specify additional directories to be searched for assemblies.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.SetShadowCopyPath%2A>方法不會指定要在其中搜尋組件的其他目錄。

trans-unit.source: Assemblies to be shadow-copied must already be located in the search path, for example under <xref:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 要陰影複製組件必須已經位於搜尋路徑，例如下<xref:System.AppDomain.BaseDirectory%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.SetShadowCopyPath%2A> method specifies which search paths are eligible to be shadow-copied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.SetShadowCopyPath%2A>方法可讓您指定的搜尋路徑有資格要陰影複製。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A> property of the internal <xref:System.AppDomainSetup> associated with this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyDirectories%2A>屬性內部的<xref:System.AppDomainSetup>與這個執行個體相關聯。

trans-unit.source: For more information on shadow copying, see [Shadow Copying Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關陰影複製的詳細資訊，請參閱[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method is now obsolete, and should not be used for new development.

trans-unit.source: The principal object to attach to threads.
trans-unit.target: 要附加至執行緒的主體物件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the default principal object to be attached to threads if they attempt to bind to a principal while executing in this application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒在這個應用程式定義域中執行時嘗試繫結至預設的主體，則設定預設的主體物件附加至執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the effect of using the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetThreadPrincipal%2A> method to change the principal that is available for attaching to threads that are executing in the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示使用的效果<xref:System.AppDomain.SetThreadPrincipal%2A>方法，以變更適用於附加至應用程式定義域中執行的執行緒的主體。

trans-unit.source: It also shows the effect on threads of using the <xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A> method to change the principal policy of the application domain.
trans-unit.target: 它也會顯示在使用的執行緒上影響<xref:System.AppDomain.SetPrincipalPolicy%2A>方法，以變更應用程式定義域的主體的原則。

trans-unit.source: Gets an indication whether the application domain is configured to shadow copy files.
trans-unit.target: 取得是否已設定應用程式定義域以進行檔案陰影複製的指示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the application domain is configured to shadow copy files; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.AppDomainSetup.ShadowCopyFiles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和[陰影複製組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/shadow-copy-assemblies.md)。

trans-unit.target: 擷取物件的類型資訊，可以用來取得介面的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.

trans-unit.target: 指向接收物件提供的類型資訊介面數目的位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::GetTypeInfoCount`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the member.
trans-unit.target: 辨識成員。

trans-unit.source: Reserved for future use.
trans-unit.target: 保留供未來使用。

trans-unit.source: Must be IID_NULL.
trans-unit.target: 必須是 IID_NULL。

trans-unit.source: The locale context in which to interpret arguments.
trans-unit.target: 地區設定內容，用於解譯引數。

trans-unit.source: Flags describing the context of the call.
trans-unit.target: 描述呼叫之內容的旗標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure containing an array of arguments, an array of argument DISPIDs for named arguments, and counts for the number of elements in the arrays.
trans-unit.target: 結構的指標，此結構包含引數陣列、指名引數之 DISPID 引數的陣列，以及陣列中項目數目的計數。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to the location where the result is to be stored.
trans-unit.target: 指向用於儲存結果之位置的指標。

trans-unit.source: Pointer to a structure that contains exception information.
trans-unit.target: 包含例外狀況資訊的結構指標。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first argument that has an error.
trans-unit.target: 第一個有錯誤的引數索引。

trans-unit.source: Provides access to properties and methods exposed by an object.
trans-unit.target: 提供物件所公開的屬性和方法的存取權。

trans-unit.source: This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會從 unmanaged 程式碼，是對存取 managed 類別，並不應該從 managed 程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `IDispatch::Invoke`, see the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`IDispatch::Invoke`，請參閱 MSDN Library。

trans-unit.source: Late-bound access using the COM <c>IDispatch</c> interface is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援使用 COM <c>IDispatch</c> 介面進行晚期繫結的存取。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a string representation that includes the friendly name of the application domain and any context policies.
trans-unit.target: 取得字串表示，其中包含應用程式定義域及任何內容原則的易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string formed by concatenating the literal string "Name:", the friendly name of the application domain, and either string representations of the context policies or the string "There are no context policies."
trans-unit.target: 將常值字串 "Name:"、應用程式定義域的易記名稱、內容原則的字串表示或字串 "There are no context policies" 串連起來所構成的字串。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays the return value of the <xref:System.AppDomain.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的傳回值<xref:System.AppDomain.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The application domain represented by the current <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> has been unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 已經卸載目前的 <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> 所表示的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the resolution of a type fails.
trans-unit.target: 發生於類型解析失敗時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve> event occurs when the common language runtime is unable to determine the assembly that can create the requested type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve> Common language runtime 無法判斷組件可以建立要求的型別時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the type is defined in a dynamic assembly, or the type is not defined in a dynamic assembly but the runtime does not know which assembly the type is defined in.
trans-unit.target: 如果類型定義在動態組件，或動態組件中未定義型別，但執行階段不知道哪個組件中定義此類型，也可能會發生。

trans-unit.source: The latter situation can occur when <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is called with a type name that is not qualified with the assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 後者的情況可能會發生時<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>呼叫組件名稱不合格的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler> for this event can attempt to locate and create the type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ResolveEventHandler>針對此事件可以嘗試找出並建立型別。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve> event does not occur if the runtime knows it is not possible to find a type in certain assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve>事件不會發生執行階段知道不可能在特定的組件中尋找的型別。

trans-unit.source: For example, this event does not occur if the type is not found in a static assembly because the runtime knows types cannot be added dynamically to static assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 例如，不會不會發生此事件類型中找不到靜態組件因為執行階段知道類型無法以動態方式加入至靜態組件。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property contains the assembly that requested the type.
trans-unit.target: 開頭為[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性包含要求的類型之組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following sample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve>事件。

trans-unit.source: For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何取得完整組件名稱資訊，請參閱[組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an exception is not caught.
trans-unit.target: 發生於未攔截到例外狀況時。

trans-unit.source: This event provides notification of uncaught exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件會提供無法攔截的例外狀況的通知。

trans-unit.source: It allows the application to log information about the exception before the system default handler reports the exception to the user and terminates the application.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓應用程式系統預設處理常式報告給使用者的例外狀況和終止應用程式之前記錄例外狀況的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: If sufficient information about the state of the application is available, other actions may be undertaken — such as saving program data for later recovery.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的狀態相關的足夠資訊是否可用，則可能會採取其他動作，例如儲存供稍後復原程式資料。

trans-unit.source: Caution is advised, because program data can become corrupted when exceptions are not handled.
trans-unit.target: 請謹慎，因為當未處理例外狀況程式資料可能變成損毀。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, application termination and debugging options are reported to the user before this event is raised, rather than after.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，應用程式終止和偵錯選項會向使用者報告就會引發此事件之前，而非之後。

trans-unit.source: This event can be handled in any application domain.
trans-unit.target: 在任何應用程式定義域中，可以處理這個事件。

trans-unit.source: However, the event is not necessarily raised in the application domain where the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 不過，此事件不一定會引發例外狀況的發生位置的應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: An exception is unhandled only if the entire stack for the thread has been unwound without finding an applicable exception handler, so the first place the event can be raised is in the application domain where the thread originated.
trans-unit.target: 只有當執行緒在整個堆疊已回溯而不尋找適用的例外狀況處理常式，因此可能引發此事件的第一個位置是在該執行緒的來源應用程式定義域中，會形成未處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, this event occurs only for the default application domain that is created by the system when an application is started.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，只針對應用程式啟動時，系統所建立的預設應用程式定義域會發生此事件。

trans-unit.source: If an application creates additional application domains, specifying a delegate for this event in those applications domains has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式建立其他應用程式定義域，這些應用程式定義域中指定此事件的委派沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event is handled in the default application domain, it is raised there for any unhandled exception in any thread, no matter what application domain the thread started in.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>預設應用程式定義域中處理事件，會引發此事件發生的任何未處理任何執行緒，無論何種應用程式定義域中的例外狀況已啟動執行緒。

trans-unit.source: If the thread started in an application domain that has an event handler for <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>, the event is raised in that application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果有事件處理常式的應用程式定義域中啟動執行緒<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>，應用程式定義域中引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If that application domain is not the default application domain, and there is also an event handler in the default application domain, the event is raised in both application domains.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式定義域不是預設應用程式定義域，而且也沒有事件處理常式預設應用程式定義域中，會引發兩個應用程式定義域中。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a thread starts in application domain "AD1", calls a method in application domain "AD2", and from there calls a method in application domain "AD3", where it throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，假設在執行緒啟動應用程式定義域"AD1 」，呼叫的方法"AD2，」 的應用程式定義域中，從該處呼叫應用程式定義域"AD3 」，方法會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The first application domain in which the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event can be raised is "AD1".
trans-unit.target: 第一個應用程式定義域，<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>可以引發事件會 「 AD1"。

trans-unit.source: If that application domain is not the default application domain, the event can also be raised in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式定義域不是預設應用程式定義域，也可能引發此事件的預設應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: The common language runtime suspends thread aborts while event handlers for the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event are executing.
trans-unit.target: Common language runtime 會暫止執行緒中止時的事件處理常式<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>事件正在執行。

trans-unit.source: If the event handler has a <xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContractAttribute> attribute with the appropriate flags, the event handler is treated as a constrained execution region.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件處理常式具有<xref:System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.ReliabilityContractAttribute>屬性與適當的旗標，此事件處理常式會被視為限制的執行區域。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], this event is not raised for exceptions that corrupt the state of the process, such as stack overflows or access violations, unless the event handler is security-critical and has the <xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會引發這個事件的例外狀況，損毀的處理程序的狀態，例如，堆疊溢位，或存取違規，除非此事件處理常式為安全性關鍵的而且有<xref:System.Runtime.ExceptionServices.HandleProcessCorruptedStateExceptionsAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, an unhandled exception that occurs in a thread other than the main application thread is caught by the runtime and therefore does not cause the application to terminate.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，主應用程式執行緒以外的執行緒中發生未處理例外狀況捕捉到的執行階段，因此不會造成應用程式結束。

trans-unit.source: Thus, it is possible for the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event to be raised without the application terminating.
trans-unit.target: 因此，很可能讓<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>而不需要應用程式終止會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this backstop for unhandled exceptions in child threads was removed, because the cumulative effect of such silent failures included performance degradation, corrupted data, and lockups, all of which were difficult to debug.
trans-unit.target: 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，這個子執行緒中的未處理例外狀況的支援已移除，因為這類的無訊息失敗的累積效果包含效能降低、 損毀的資料和鎖定，且很難偵錯。

trans-unit.source: For more information, including a list of cases in which the runtime does not terminate, see [Exceptions in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，包括清單的情況下，執行階段不會終止，請參閱[Managed 執行緒中的例外狀況](~/docs/standard/threading/exceptions-in-managed-threads.md)。

trans-unit.source: To register an event handler for this event, you must have the required permissions, or a <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊此事件的事件處理常式，您必須擁有必要的權限，或<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>就會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Other Events for Unhandled Exceptions
trans-unit.target: 未處理例外狀況的其他事件

trans-unit.source: For certain application models, the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event can be preempted by other events if the unhandled exception occurs in the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: 某些應用程式模型，<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>事件可以清空的其他事件，如果主應用程式執行緒中發生未處理的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: In applications that use Windows Forms, unhandled exceptions in the main application thread cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadException?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows Form 應用程式，在未處理主應用程式執行緒發生原因的例外狀況<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadException?displayProperty=nameWithType>會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: If this event is handled, the default behavior is that the unhandled exception does not terminate the application, although the application is left in an unknown state.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理此事件，預設行為是未處理的例外狀況不會終止該應用程式，雖然應用程式處於未知狀態。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by using the application configuration file, or by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetUnhandledExceptionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to change the mode to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UnhandledExceptionMode.ThrowException?displayProperty=nameWithType> before the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadException> event handler is hooked up.
trans-unit.target: 可以變更此行為，藉由使用應用程式組態檔，或是利用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetUnhandledExceptionMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以將模式變更為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UnhandledExceptionMode.ThrowException?displayProperty=nameWithType>之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.ThreadException>連結事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: This applies only to the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: 只適用於主應用程式執行緒。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event is raised for unhandled exceptions thrown in other threads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>其他執行緒中擲回未處理的例外狀況就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Microsoft Visual Studio 2005, the Visual Basic application framework provides another event for unhandled exceptions in the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: 從 Microsoft Visual Studio 2005 開始，Visual Basic 應用程式架構可以提供另一個事件中主應用程式執行緒的未處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.UnhandledException?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This event has an event arguments object with the same name as the event arguments object used by <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException?displayProperty=nameWithType>, but with different properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件必須與所使用的事件引數物件的名稱相同的事件引數物件<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException?displayProperty=nameWithType>，但具有不同的屬性。

trans-unit.source: In particular, this event arguments object has an <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A> property that allows the application to continue running, ignoring the unhandled exception (and leaving the application in an unknown state).
trans-unit.target: 特別是，此事件的引數物件具有<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.UnhandledExceptionEventArgs.ExitApplication%2A>屬性，可讓應用程式繼續執行，而忽略未處理的例外狀況 （並讓應用程式處於未知狀態）。

trans-unit.source: In that case, the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException?displayProperty=nameWithType>不會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: The followingexample demonstrates the <xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: 如以下範例示範<xref:System.AppDomain.UnhandledException>事件。

trans-unit.source: It defines an event handler, `MyHandler`, that is invoked whenever an unhandled exception is thrown in the default application domain.
trans-unit.target: 它會定義事件處理常式， `MyHandler`，每當預設應用程式定義域中擲回未處理的例外狀況時，會叫用。

trans-unit.source: It then throws two exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 則會擲回兩個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The first is handled by a **try/catch** block.
trans-unit.target: 第一個工作由**try/catch**區塊。

trans-unit.source: The second is unhandled and invokes the `MyHandle` routine before the application terminates.
trans-unit.target: 第二個未處理，並叫用`MyHandle`應用程式終止前的常式。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: An application domain to unload.
trans-unit.target: 要卸載的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: Unloads the specified application domain.
trans-unit.target: 卸載指定的應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 there is a thread dedicated to unloading application domains.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 2.0 版中已有執行緒專門用來卸載應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: This improves reliability, especially when the .NET Framework is hosted.
trans-unit.target: 這可改善可靠性，尤其是當裝載.NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: When a thread calls <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>, the target domain is marked for unloading.
trans-unit.target: 當一個執行緒呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>，目標網域已標示為卸載。

trans-unit.source: The dedicated thread attempts to unload the domain, and all threads in the domain are aborted.
trans-unit.target: 專用的執行緒嘗試卸載定義域，並在網域中的所有執行緒都會都中止。

trans-unit.source: If a thread does not abort, for example because it is executing unmanaged code, or because it is executing a `finally` block, then after a period of time a <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException> is thrown in the thread that originally called <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果執行緒不會中止，例如因為它正在執行 unmanaged 程式碼，或因為它正在執行`finally`區塊，然後在一段時間之後<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>初次呼叫的執行緒中擲回<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the thread that could not be aborted eventually ends, the target domain is not unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 如果無法最終中止的執行緒結束，則目標網域未卸載。

trans-unit.source: Thus, in the .NET Framework version 2.0 `domain` is not guaranteed to unload, because it might not be possible to terminate executing threads.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在.NET Framework 2.0 版`domain`不保證卸除，因為它可能無法終止正在執行的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, calling <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A> causes an immediate <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>, for example if it is called in a finalizer.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>會導致立即<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>，例如如果呼叫完成項中。

trans-unit.source: The threads in `domain` are terminated using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A> method, which throws a <xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException> in the thread.
trans-unit.target: 中的執行緒`domain`使用終止<xref:System.Threading.Thread.Abort%2A>方法，就會擲回<xref:System.Threading.ThreadAbortException>執行緒中。

trans-unit.source: Although the thread should terminate promptly, it can continue executing for an unpredictable amount of time in a `finally` clause.
trans-unit.target: 雖然執行緒應該會立即結束，它會繼續執行的無法預期的時間量以`finally`子句。

trans-unit.source: Version Compatibility
trans-unit.target: 版本相容性

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.0 and 1.1 if the thread that calls <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A> is running in `domain`, another thread is started to perform the unload operation.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1，如果呼叫執行緒<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>，正在`domain`，另一個執行緒已啟動執行卸載作業。

trans-unit.source: If `domain` cannot be unloaded, a <xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException> is thrown in that thread, not in the original thread that called <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`domain`無法卸載，<xref:System.CannotUnloadAppDomainException>該執行緒不在原始呼叫的執行緒中擲回<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, if the thread that calls <xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A> is running outside `domain`, that thread receives the exception.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果執行緒呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.Unload%2A>執行外部`domain`，執行緒會收到例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to unload an application domain.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何卸載應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="domain" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="domain" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="domain" /> could not be unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法卸載 <paramref name="domain" />。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the unload process.
trans-unit.target: 卸載程序期間發生錯誤。

trans-unit.source: to add an event handler for this event.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入此事件的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlAppDomain" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlAppDomain" />。

trans-unit.target: 安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />。
